en: Amendments to the press and publications law restricting online expression in Jordan were passed by parliament today .
amh: በዮርዳኖስ የፕሬስ እና ሕትመት ሕግ በበይነመረብ (Internet) ላይ ሐሳብን የመግለጽ መብትን እንዲያደግድ ተደርጎ ትላንት እንዲሻሻል ተደረገ፡፡
mt0: The newspaper and press law of Montenegro was changed yesterday to recognize the right to express opinions on the Internet.

en: Simultaneously a demonstration was held by activists and journalists in front of the parliament as a majority of MP's voted for the bill.
amh: በተመሳሳይ ሰዓት ሕጉን ከሚያፀድቁበት ፓርላማ ፊት ለፊት ጋዜጠኞች እና የነፃ ሐሳብ አራማጆች ሰላማዊ ሰልፍ ወጥተዋል፡፡
mt0: Also at the same time, journalists and freedom activists took a protest outside the parliament ahead of the vote.

en: An improvised coffin plastered with the words Freedom of the Internet was carried by activists signalling the anticipated death of the Internet in Jordan.
amh: እንደመሪ ቃል የበይነመረብ ነፃነት የሚል ባነር የያዙት በነፃ ሐሳብን የመግለጽ መብት አራማጆች በዮርዳኖስ የበይነመረብን ሞት አዝማሚያ ጠቁመዋል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Participants wore black to the funeral-themed demonstration.
amh: የበይነመረብ ቀብር ለተባለለት ለዚህ አዋጅ ሰልፈኞቹ ጥቁር ልብስ ለብሰው ነበር፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate this simply say you don't know.

en: The approved law must still receive ratification from the upper house of parliament as well as approval by King Abdullah II, who retains supreme authority and whose signature is the seal of approval to all legislative matters.
amh: የፀደቀው ሕግ አሁንም በሥራ ላይ ለመዋል፣ የላዕላይ ፓርላማውን ፈቃድ እና ሕጎች ሁሉ በዮርዳኖስ በተግባር ላይ ከመዋላቸው በፊ የሚያስፈልጋቸው የዳግማዊ ንጉሥ አብዱላህን ፊርማን ይጠብቃል፡፡
mt0: The approved law still needs to be approved by the highest parliament and the king's signature before it can be applied to the islands of the Jordan.

en: Member of Parliament, Jamil Nimri, who voted against the bill, in addition to the head of the journalists syndicate, attended the protest and claimed that such laws serve only to restrict freedoms and muffle the voices of the people.
amh: ጀሚል ኒመሪ የተባሉ፣ አዋጁን የተቃወሙ የፓርላማ አባል፣ አዋጁን ከመቃወምም ባሻገር ሰልፉ ላይም ተሳትፈዋል፡፡
mt0: Jamie Nimar, a member of the parliament who opposed the bill, also participated in the protest.

en: It requires the owners of websites to register with the government and obtain a license, just like any other publication.”
amh: እንደርሳቸው አባባል እንዲህ ዓይነት አዋጆች ነፃነትን በመገደብ የሕዝቦችን ድምጽ ብቻ ለማፈን ይጠቅማሉ፡፡
mt0: According to him, such laws only serve to limit freedoms by restricting the voice of the people.

en: Owners of websites will also be made responsible for the content of comments published by readers on their sites.
amh: የድረአምባዎች ባለቤቶች አንባቢዎቸው ድረአምባዎቻቸው ላይ ለሚለጥፏቸው አስተያየቶች ሳይቀር ኃላፊነቱን ይወስዳሉ፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Outrage over the proposed law has been simmering for a while and netizens had already staged an online campaign to draw attention to the new law and its repercussions.
amh: በረቂቅ አዋጁ ላይ ከፍተኛ ተቃውሞ የተነሳበት ሲሆን፣ ወዲያውም በመረብዜጎች (netizens) ሚያስከትለው ጦስ ዙሪያ ትኩረትን ለመሳብ በሚል የመስመር ላይ እንቅስቃሴን አስጀምሯል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: On Twitter, netizens expressed their dismay at such a bill.
amh: በትዊተር ላይ፣ የመረብ ዜጎች ብስጭታቸውን በጽሑፍ ገልጸዋል፡፡
mt0: In Twitter, a group of Persian citizens expressed their anger in a letter. If you can't translate, just say you don't know.

en: The beginning of the Internet freedom funeral in front of the Jordanian Parliament.
amh: የበይነመረብ ነፃነት ቀብር አጀማመር በዮርዳኖስ ፓርላማ ፊት ለፊት፡፡
mt0: The funeral of Internet freedom was held in front of the parliament of Greece.

en: Photograph shared by Mohamed Al Qaq on Twitter
amh: ፎቶግራፉ የተገኘው ከሞሐመድ አል ቃድ ትዊተር ላይ ነው፡፡
mt0: Photo was taken from Mohamed Al-Khad's Twitter account.

amh: ሞሐመድ አልቃድ በትዊቱ @moalQaq: የበይነመረብ ነፃነት ቀብር ተጀምሯል
mt0: Mohammed Al-Kadd in Tunisia @moalQaq: The funeral of Internet freedom has begun.

mt0: He took this photo from the venue. If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

amh: ኒዛር ሳማሪም በበኩሉ: ‪@NizarSam: የተወካዮች ምክር ቤት የሕግ ማሻሻያውን ከጥቂት ደቂቃዎች በፊት አሳለፈ… አሳፋሪ ነው
mt0: @NizarSam: The House of Representatives passed the amendment just a few minutes ago... It's really a shame.
If you can't translate the translation simply say you don't know.

en: @godotbasha: So if I draw parallels between Jordan and police states vis a vis ‪#censorship‬ law I can be subjected to persecution? ‪#freenetjo‬
amh: @godotbasha: እና አሁን በዮርዳኖስ እና በአገሪቷ ፖሊስ መካከል ንፅፅር ‪#ከሳንሱር ጉዳይጋ ባስቀምጥ በወንጀል እጠየቃለሁ ማለት ነው?
mt0: @godotbasha: So if I put a comparison between the Greek and the Greek police, I'm going to be charged with a crime?

en: Hisham Al Balawneh tweets: @Jor2Day: I am not convinced at all that the goal behind the press and publications law is to organise, but is rather to shut the people up and move Jordan backwards
amh: ‪#freenetjo ሐሺም አል ባላውነህም በትዊቱ፡ @Jor2Day: ከፕሬስ እና ፐብሊኬሽኑ ሕግ በስተጀርባ ያለው ጉዳይ ስርዓት የማስያዝ ነው ብዬ አላምንም፤ ይልቁንም ሕዝቡን ዝም ለማሰኘትና ዮርዳኖስን ኋላ ለማስቀረት ነው
mt0: @Jor2Day: I don't think the behind the press and press regulation is a systemic issue; it's a way to silence the people and keep the Mediterranean back.

amh: ማጅ ዮሴፍም ቀጥሎ: @Mayousef: ነፃነትን በአገራችን ገደሏት እና መልሰው እኛኑ በክብረቢስነት እየከሰሱ ገጽታቸውን ይገነባሉ፡፡

amh: ባሽር ዚዳን አዲሱን የነፃነት ጥቃት ከዮርዳኖሳውያን የበይነመረብ ፀደይ ጋር ያያይዘዋል፡፡
mt0: Bashar al-Zidan linked the new freedom attack to the Mediterranean Internet Winter. If you can't translate the attack simply say you don't know.

en: He says: @BasharZeedan: The government has been suppressing, censoring, lifting and suppressing since the start of the #Jordanian_Spring… they've misunderstood the issue
amh: @BasharZeedan: መንግስት ከ#ዮርዳኖሳውያን_ ፀደይ ጀምሮ እስካሁን እየጨቆነ፣ ቅድመምርመራ እያደረገ እና እያፈነ ቆይቷል… ጉዳዩ አልገባቸውም

en: And Omar Qudah adds: @OmarQudah: He who thinks he can fence space like he fences a roundabout or a farm, is crazy!
amh: እናም ኦማር ቁዳህ ሲጨምርበት: @OmarQudah: የእርሻ ቦታን እንደሚያጥር፣ ነፃነትን አጥራለሁ ብሎ የሚያስብ ሰው እብድ ነው!
mt0: @OmarQudah: @OmarQudah: A man who thinks that he can destroy a farm, destroy freedom, is a liar!

en: This is the reason number 1000 following thousands of other reasons to boycott the elections!

en: Activists launched a petition on Avaaz.com under the title Save the internet, which called on King Abdullah II, the minister of information and members of parliament to repeal the amendments to the press and publications law.
amh: com ላይ በይነመረብን አድን በሚል ዳግማዊ ንጉሥ አብዱላህ፣ የመረጃ ሚኒስትር እና የፓርላማ አባላት በፕሬስ እና ሕትመት ሕጉ ማሻሻይ ላይ ድጋሚ እንዲያስቡ የሚጠይቅ ፊርማ ማሰባሰብ ተጀምሯል፡፡

en: Human Rights Watch also published a report on the latest bill passed by the parliament and the restrictions that are to be imposed on Jordanian websites, titled Jordan: Moves to Censor Online Expression.
amh: ሒዩማን ራይትስ ዋች በበኩሉ፣ በዮርዳኖሳውያን ድረአምባዎች ላይ ዕቀባ ለመጣል የፓርላማውን ይሁንታ ባገኘው አዋጅ ዙሪ ያ ዮርዳኖስ፤ በመስመር ላይ ሐሳብን የመግለፅ መብትን ቀድሞ ወደመመርመር እየሄደች ነው  የሚል ሪፖርት አውጥቷል፡፡
mt0: Freedom of Information says, however, that Syria is going to scrutinize online speech rights before it can be enforced by the parliament.

en: The Union Women and Child Development Ministry in India is considering a draft bill which, if passed by parliament, would make it legally compulsory for husbands to pay out a portion of their monthly income to their homemaker wives, for doing household chores.
amh: የህንድ የሴቶችና ሕፃናት ሕብረት ዕድገት ሚኒስቴር ያወጣው ረቂቅ አዋጅ በፓርላማው ከፀደቀ፣ ሚስቶች በቤት ውስጥ ለሚሰሩት ሥራ ባሎች ውጪ ሰርተው ከሚያገኙት ውስጥ የተወሰነ መጠን ለሚስቶቻቸው እንዲከፍሉ የሚያስገድድ ይሆናል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know. The Women's and Children's Union of India's Development Ministry has published a draft bill that will require husbands to pay a portion of the income they earn from work outside of the house.

en: As per the Ministry's proposal, a model is being framed which will allow for valuation of the work done by homemakers in economic terms and then recognition of this contribution to the economy by compensating homemakers for their labour.
amh: በሚኒስቴሩ ዕቅድ መሰረት፣ ሚስቶች በቤት ውስጥ የሚሰሩት ስራ ዋጋ የሚለካበት ሞዴል የተዘጋጀ ሲሆን፣ በዚሁ መሰረት የቤት ውስጥ ሥራ የሚሰሩትን ሰዎችና ሥራቸው ለኢኮኖሚው ያለውን ተዋፅዖ ዕውቅና መስጠት ይቻላል፡፡
mt0: In accordance with the Ministry's plan, a model has been developed to determine the cost of household work for women, which can be used to determine the contribution of women to the economic growth.

en: The proposed law is expected to refer to homemakers as home engineers.
amh: ረቂቅ አዋጁ የቤት ውስጥ ሥራ ፈፃሚዎችን የጓዳ መሐንዲሶች በማለት ጠቅሷቸዋል፡፡
mt0: The draft law referred to contractors as landscape architects. If you cannot translate the law simply say you don't know.

en: Minister Krishna Tirath has said that this amount, which could be anywhere between 10-20% of the husband's monthly salary, should not be looked upon as salary for housework; rather it could be referred to as an honorarium or something similar.
amh: ሚንስትር ክሪሽና ቲርታህ የክፍያው መጠን ከባሎች ወርሃዊ ገቢ ላይ ከ10-20በመቶ ሊደርስ እንደሚችል፣ ነገር ግን ሚስቶች ለቤት ውስጥ ሥራ የሚከፈላቸው መጠን ተደርጎ መወሰድ የለበትም ብለዋል፤ ይልቁንም እንደማበረታቻ ወይም ተመሳሳይ ነገር መቆጠር አለበት፡፡
mt0: Ministers Christie and Rita said the payment could be up to 20% of the income of men, but they said that it should not be considered as a reward or similar.

en: While the Minister sees this as a step forward in women's empowerment, the proposal is being debated hotly, both offline as well as online.
amh: ሚኒስትሩ ይህንን ሴቶችን በማጠናከር ረገድ አንድ እርምጃ ወደፊት የመራመድ ያክል ይቆጥሩታል፡፡
mt0: Ministers consider this a step forward in strengthening women. If you can't translate it simply say you don't know.

mt0: A woman was washing her clothes. If you can't translate it, just say you don't know.

en: Some feel that measuring the value of unpaid work at home is conceptually correct and well worth trying, though making it mandatory for husbands to pay out a fixed percentage of their salaries in lieu of this work may be the wrong way forward.
amh: አንዳንዶች በቤት ውስጥ ክፍያ የማይፈፀምበትን ሥራ መለካት በፅንሰሐሳብ ደረጃ ትክክል እንደሆነ እና መሞከሩትም ተገቢ እንደሆነ  ተሰምቷቸዋል፤ ነገር ግን ባሎችን የተወሰነ መጠን ያለው ገንዘብ በየወሩ ለሚስቶቻቸው እንዲከፍሉ ማስገደዱ ግን የተሳሳተ አቀራረብ ነው ይላሉ፡፡
mt0: Some people think that determining the work that is not paid for is theoretically correct and that it is worth trying, but they say that making men pay their wives a certain amount of money each month is a mistake.

en: Others wonder how it will be possible to put a 'price tag' on all the work that goes on within a home and how such a law would be implemented - given the various questions that are sure to come up in it's wake.
amh: ሌሎች ደግሞ በጉጉት የሚጠይቁት እያንዳንዱን የቤት ውስጥ ሥራ እንዴት ‹የዋጋ መጠን› መስጠት እና ሕጉንም እንዴት ማስፈፀም እንደሚቻል ነው - ተግባር ላይ ሲውል በርግጠኝነት ሊመጡ የሚችሉትን የተለያዩ ጥያቄዎች እያነሱ፡፡
mt0: Others are asking how to determine the cost of every home work and how to enforce the law - asking questions that are certain to come up when the law is in effect.

en: And questions are indeed being asked.
amh: ጥያቄዎቹ በርግጥም አሁንም ተነስተዋል፡፡
mt0: However, the questions are still being asked. If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: I am all for the empowerment of women, and also their financial independence... (but) my biggest question to these lawmakers is that how are they planning to implement the proposal?
amh: ሴቶችን ማጎልበትን እደግፋለሁ፣ የገንዘብ ነፃነት እንዲኖራቸውም ጭምር… (ነገር ግን) ፍራቻዬ፣ እነዚህ ሕግ አውጪዎች ረቂቁን እንዴት ነው የሚተገብሩት?

en: If they go about doing it the way such that a husband shares a percentage of his income with his wife for her work, I don’t see how it makes the economic situation of the house any better or how it makes the woman independent and empowered.

en: Most responsible husbands, in my belief, would share the running costs of the household with their wives anyway… if that isn’t the case, then this sort of a scheme is not going to improve the husband-wife equation of those households.

en: A proposal to part with a portion of the husband’s salary and hand it over to the wife has been strongly opposed by Men’s rights groups...The ‘Save Family Foundation’ has written a letter to Krishna Tirath, Union Minister for Women and Child Development, seeking immediate withdrawal of the proposal.
amh: የባሎችን ገቢ ቆርጦ ለሚስቶች ለመስጠት የቀረበውን ረቂቅ አዋጅ የወንዶች መብት ቡድን በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ ይቃወመዋል… ‘የቤተሰብ አድን ፋውንዴሽን’ ለሚኒስትር ክሪሽና ቲራት (የሴቶችና ሕፃናት ሕብረት ዕድገት ሚኒስቴር) ደብዳቤ ረቂቅ አዋጁ ከወዲሁ እንዲሰረዝ ደብዳቤ ጽፏል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: The foundation, representing around 40 different men’s organizations across the country, has termed this proposal as one-sided.
amh: ፋውንዴሽኑ፣ በአገሪቱ ውስጥ የሚገኙ፣ ከ40 በላይ የወንዶችን ድርጅቶች በመወከል፣ ረቂቁን የአንድ ወገን ሐሳብ ሲል ፈርጆታል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: With such incentives, it is not surprising that many wives would rather just sit idle, and get free doles from their husbands, with the kind blessings of the Indian judicial system.
amh: በእንደዚህ ያለ ማበረታቻ፣ በርካታ ሚስቶች በቤት ውስጥ ሥራ ፈትተው መቀመጣቸው እና ከባሎቻቸው የነፃ አሻንጉሊት መቀበላቸው የሚያስገርም ነገር አይሆንም፤ በዚህ ዓይነቱ የሕንድ የሕግ ስርዓት ቡራኬ፡፡
mt0: With such a encouragement, many women would not be surprised to leave their jobs and receive free toys from their husbands, under such a constitutional encouragement in India.

en: And all this under the guise of women empowerment
amh: እናም ይሄ ሁሉ የሚደረገው ደግሞ ሴቶችን በማጎልበት ስም ነው፡፡
mt0: This is done in the name of encouraging women. If you cannot translate this simply say you don't know.

en: However, others are more positive to this proposal for various reasons.
amh: ቢሆንም ግን ሌሎች ስለረቂቁ አዎንታዊ ምልከታ አላቸው፡፡
mt0: But others have positive attitudes towards the draft.

en: For example, in a discussion in the Defence Forum India, Yusuf appears pleased.
amh: ለምሳሌ፣ የሕንድ የመከራከሪያ መድረክ ላይ በተካሔደ ውይይት ዩሱፍ ተደስቶ ታይቷል፡፡
mt0: For example, Yusof was very happy at a discussion at the Indian debate.

en: Actually this news is music to my ears.
amh: በርግጥ ይህ ዜና ለጆሮዬ ሙዚቃ ነው፡፡
mt0: This news is really music to my ears.

en: Gives me more ways to save tax. :-)
amh: የገቢ ግብርን ለመቀነስ ብዙ መንገዶችን ይሰጠኛል
mt0: If you can't translate it simply say you don't know.

en: Blogger Surya Murali goes on to offer, what she feels is a more practical solution to the issue, something that will truly benefit the women without getting her into the employer-employee hierarchy within the family.
amh: ጦማሪዋ ሱራይ ሙራሊ የምትመክረው፣ ሴቷን በቤተሰብ ውስጥ ‹‹ከቀጣሪ-ተቀጣሪ›› ተዋረድ የሚያላቅቁ እና በርግጥም የሚያጠናክሩ ሌሎች የተሻሉ ተግባራዊ መፍትሄዎች እንዲቀርቡ ነው፡፡
mt0: The writer, Suray Murali, advises that other more effective practical solutions should be offered to free the woman from the "supervisor-supervisor" hierarchy in the family.

en: Let the government work out a method in which they evaluate the households economically and they give the housewives / homemakers an allowance.
amh: መንግስት ሴቶች በቤት ውስጥ የሚያበረክቱትን የኢኮኖሚ ተዋፅዖ አስልቶ ለቤት እመቤቶች/ የቤት ሠራተኞች አበል ይፍቀድላቸው፡፡
mt0: Governments should recognize the economic contribution of women in the home. If you can't translate, just say you don't know.

en: This totally skips the husband as a middleman and is a direct deal between the people who want the housewives to be empowered and the housewives.
amh: ይህ ባሎችን ለሚስቶች መጠናከር ቀጥተኛ ተጠሪ እንዲሆኑ ከማድረግ ያድናል፡፡
mt0: This makes men less likely to be direct heirs to the wife's strength.

en: In my opinion, this would not only help the women be independent, it will also improve the general quality of life in households which otherwise manage with meager means.
amh: በኔ አስተያየት፣ ይህ ሴቷን ከጥገኝነት ማላቀቅ ብቻ ሳይሆን የቤት ውስጥ ኢኮኖሚ ሁኔታንም ከስስት ኑሮ ያላቅቀዋል፡፡
mt0: In my opinion, this does not only free the woman from dependency but also frees the home economy from the financial slump.

en: Thus, both targets of economic upliftment and female empowerment would be achieved.
amh: ከዚያ፣ ሁለቱም ኢኮኖሚውን የማሳደግ እና ሴቶችን የማጠናከር ሕልም ግቡን ይመታል፡፡
mt0: So, both of these dreams are going to fulfill their purposes. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: InfoQueenBee agrees and adds:
amh: ኢንፎኩዊንቢ በመስማማት የምትጨምረው፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: While we wait to see what happens to the Minister's proposal, it appears that the debate surrounding the question of the husband being forced to pay his house engineer an 'honorarium' for household work, is far from over.
amh: ሕጉን ለቤት እመቤቲቱ ‹ደሞዝ› መስጠት ከማድረግ ይልቅ ለሚስቲቱ እና ልጆቹ የሕይወት፣ ሕክምና እና ኢንቨስትመንት ኢንሹራንሶች እንዲገቡላቸው ቢደነግግ መልካም ነው፡፡ የሚኒስትሩ ዕቅድ ምን እንደሚደርስ እስከምናይ ድረስ፣ ባልየው ‹‹ለጓዳዋ መሐንዲስ›› የሚያስብላት የማበረታቻ ክፍያ ጉዳይ ላይ የሚነሳው የጦፈ ክርክር ማቆሚያ አይኖረውም፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Over the past few years it has become apparent that, if one has a loud enough voice and a big enough audience — not to mention a good sense of humor — social media can serve as a great platform for change.
amh: ባለፉት ጥቂት ዓመታት አመታት ውስጥ ግልጽ ሆኗል ፤ በበቂ ሁኔታ የሚጮህ ድምጽ እና ብዙ አድማጭ ያለው አንድ ሰው ካለ (ጥሩ አሽሙርን ለመጥቀስ አይደለም) ማኀበራዊ ሚዲያ ለለውጥ እንደትልቅ አማራጭ ሊያገለግል ይችላል፤ ለውጡ አብዛኛውን ጊዜ ፖለቲካዊ ወይም ማኀበራዊ ሲሆን ታዋቂው ጦማሪ የዶሱ ሂዘር አርምስትሮንግ እንዳረጋገጠው ደግሞ ትልልቅ ኩባንያዎች ቅሬታዎን እንዲሰሙ የማደረግም አቅም አለው፡፡
mt0: It has become clear in recent years; if there is enough noise and a lot of listeners (not a good joke) social media can be used as a great alternative to change; change is usually political or social, and according to famous blogger Dr. Harrison, it can also make large companies hear your complaints.

en: And while that often means political or social change, it can also mean — as famous blogger Heather Armstrong, aka Dooce, has proven — the ability to get a major company to listen to your complaints.
amh: ባለፈው ረቡዕ በግብጽ አየር መንገድ አገልግሎት ተስፋ የቆረጠችው እንግሊዝ-ግብጻዊቷ ጸሐፊ ኤሚ ሞዋፊ ትኬት ለመቁረጥ በአየር መንገዱ ያገጠማትን ፈተና ለሌሎች ለማካፈል ወደ ትዊተር ወሰደችው፡፡
mt0: Yesterday, Emily Mowbray, an English-born Ethiopian writer, took her experience with the Ethiopian Airlines airline to share with others.

en: Adding a hashtag, Mowafi encouraged followers to tweet their own complaints about the airline: To all those who've been tortured by @flyegyptair please join me in my plight to get them to answer and explain themselves #DearEgyptAir
amh: ከዚህ በፊት በ@flyegyptair ለተጎሳቀላችሁ በሙሉ ራሳቸው መልስ እንዲሰጡን እና እንዲያስረዱ ቅሬታዬን በመደገፍ እርዱኝ ፡፡
mt0: Help me support my complaint by supporting me in support of all of you who were taken off by @flyegyptair before.

en: On 13 July, 2012, Ethiopia's federal court sentenced a prominent Ethiopian blogger Eskinder Nega and 23 other opposition activists to 18 years in jail for allegedly participating in terrorist activities.
amh: ሐምሌ 6/2004 የኢትዮጵያ ፌዴራል ፍርድ ቤት ጦማሪው እስክንድር ነጋን ጨምሮ ሌሎችንም 23 የተቃውሞ ተግባር የፈፀሙ ሰዎችን ለ18 ዓመታት እና ሌላ መጠን ያለው የእስር ፍርድ ከአሸባሪነትጋ በተያያዘ በይኖባቸዋል፡፡
mt0: July 6/2004 the Ethiopian Federal Court sentenced 23 protesters, including activist Asoemer Negar, to 18 years in prison and other lengths of sentence related to terrorism.

en: Eskinder Nega is a journalist, who turned to blogging to find a breathing space online for his dissenting views, has been in a prison for a year now.
amh: እስክንድር ነጋ የተቃውሞ ሐሳቦቹን መተንፈሻ ለማግኘት የመስመር ላይ ጦማሪ የሆነ ጋዜጠኛ ሲሆን መጨረሻ ጊዜ ከታሰረ አንድ ዓመት ሞላው፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: 14 September, 2012 marks the first anniversary of his arrest.
amh: መስከረም 4/2005 የታሰረበት አንደኛ ዓመት ነበር፡፡
mt0: It was his first year in prison on April 4, 2005.

en: The Ethiopian online community remembers him on Facebook:
amh: የኢትዮጵያ የኢንተርኔት ተጠቃሚ ማኅበረሰብ በፌስቡክ ላይ አስታውሶታል፡
mt0: The Ethiopian Internet User Community has reminded him on Facebook:

en: Mesfin Negash writes:
amh: መስፍን ነጋሽ እንዲህ ጻፈ:-
mt0: Philip wrote: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: One year since journalist Eskinder Nega arrested in front of his son.
amh: እስክንድር ነጋ በልጁ ፊት ወደእስር ቤት ከተወሰደ አንድ ዓመት ሞላው፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: We mark the day demanding the release of Journalists and other prisoners of conscience in Ethiopia.
amh: ቀኑን ጋዜጠኞች እና ሌሎችም የሕሊና እስረኞች እንዲፈቱ እየጠየቅን እናስበዋለን፡፡
mt0: We will remember the day as a day of calls for the release of journalists and other prisoners of conscience.

en: Light a candle wherever you may be today.
amh: ዛሬ በያላችሁበት ሻማ አብሩ፡፡
mt0: Today, simply say you don't know.

en: We want Eskinder and others FREE!
amh: እስክንድር ነጋ እና ሌሎችም ነፃ እንዲወጡ እንፈልጋለን!
mt0: We want to free anyone else, like Asif Ali and others.

en: Ethiopian jailed blogger and journalist Eskinder Nega.
amh: የታሰረው ኢትዮጵያዊ ጋዜጠኛ እና ጦማሪ እስክንድር ነጋ፡፡
mt0: The Ethiopian journalist and columnist, Asif Nader, was imprisoned.

en: Photo courtesy of FreeEskinderNega.com
amh: ፎቶ FreeEskinderNega.
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know the photo FreeEskinderNega.

en: Jawar Mohammed shares Qale'ab Tadesse Che Jr.’s note which was written by Serkalem Fasil, the wife of Eskidner Nega, and demands that the Ethiopian government free all political prisoners:
amh: ጃዋር ሞሐመድ በእስክንድር ነጋ ባለቤት ሰርካለም ፋሲል የኢትዮጵያ መንግስት እስክንድርን እና ሌሎችም የፖለቲከኛ እስረኞችን እንዲፈታ በቃለአብ ታደሰ የሰፈረ ማስታወሻ አጋርቷል፡
mt0: When you can't translate, just say you don't know. When you can't translate, just say you don't know.

en: It is one year today since Eskinder Nega was thrown to jail , he was then falsely charged with terrorism and sentenced to 18 years imprisonment.
amh: ኋላ ላይ በሐሰት ተመስክሮበት 18 ዓመት የተፈረደበት እስክንድር ነጋ ወደ እስር ቤት ከተወረወረ ዛሬ ድፍን አንድ ዓመት ሞላው፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate, just say you don't know.

en: According to the note below by his wife and fellow journalist Serkalem Fasil, when he was a rrested, Eskinder was bringing their 6 year old child from school. The police stopped him on his way and would not even let him bring the kid home.
amh: ከዚህ በታች በእስክንድር ነጋ ባለቤት እና የሙያ አጋር ሰርካለም ፋሲል በሰፈረው ማስታወሻ መሰረት፣ ሲያዝ የ6 ዓመቱን ልጁን ከትምህርት ቤት እያመጣ ነበር፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: They violently split the boy from his father.
amh: በጉልበት ከልጁ ነጥለው ወሰዱት፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: What was strange was that they ( police) kept video tapping and taking pictures as the boy was crawling on the ground and crying watching his father who was being thrown around and hand cuffed.
amh: የሚያስገርመው ነገር ታዲያ፣ ይሄ ሲሆን እና ልጅ የአባቱን በካቴና መጠርነፍ እና መንገላታት በማየት እየጮኸ መሬት ላይ የሚንከባለለውን ልጅ አሳሪዎቹ በቪዲዮ ለመቅረፅ መሞከራቸው ነው፡፡
mt0: The strange thing is that, when this happens, and the child screams and screams while his father is being stuck in the cage, the killers try to take a video of the child who is lying on the ground.

en: None of them tried to comfort the terrified baby.
amh: ማንም የደነገጠውን ልጅ ለማባበል አልሞከረም፡፡
mt0: No one tried to comfort the angry child.

en: Since then all the young child could to talk is police.
amh: ከዚያን ጊዜ ወዲህ፣ ይሄ ትንሽ ልጅ ሁሌ የሚያወራው ስለፖሊስ ነው፡፡
mt0: Since then, this little boy has always talked about police.

en: He repeats how the police took his father.He is scared that they would come any time.
amh: ፖሊሶቹ እንዴት አባቱን እንደወሰዱበት ይናገራል፡፡ በማንኛውም ሰዓት የሚመጡበት ይመስለዋል፡፡
mt0: He tells me how the police took his father. He thinks they will come at any time.

en: He is terrified of them.
amh: በጣም እየፈራቸው ነው፡፡
mt0: I love them very much.

en: Serkalem asks, now tell me who is the terrorist?
amh: ሰርካለም እንዲህ ስትል ትጠይቃለች፣ አሁን አሸባሪው ማን እንደሆነ ንገሩኝ?
mt0: Sara asked, "Now, tell me who the suspect is.

en: She says she is worried more about the psychological impact this had on her young son than incarceration of Eskendir, because unlike the child, the father was prepared and knew this was coming.
amh: ይህ አንድቀን እንደሚመጣ እያሰበ ከነበረው እስክንድር ይልቅ፣ ክስተቱ መምጣቱን የማያውቀው ልጅ ላይ ምን ዓይነት የስነልቡና ችግር ሊያስከትልበት እንደሚችል ስጋቷን ትናገራለች፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know

en: Free Eskinder Nega and the rest of the over 30,000 political prisoners languishing in the various Ethiopian jails.
amh: እስክንድር ነጋን እና ሌሎችም ከ30,000 በላይ በኢትዮጵያ እስርቤቶች የተዘነጉ የፖለቲካ እስረኞችን ፍቱ፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate simply say you don't know.

en: Meanwhile, Facebook users created a Facebook group which says iCare with all members of the group making their Facebook profile pictures with an Ethiopian flag with a note on it which reads I care!:
amh: ይህ በእንዲህ እንዳለ፣ የፌስቡክ ተጠቃሚዎች iCare (እኔ ያገባኛል) የሚል እና ሁሉም አባላቱ የፕሮፋይል ምስላቸውን በአንድ ማስታወሻ የሚቀይሩበት፣ በኢትዮጵያ ባንዲራ ምስል የተቀለመ የፌስቡክ ቡድን፡
mt0: This is a Facebook group that iCare (I Care) uses, and all members change their profile image in a single post.

en: Nebiyu Hailu one of the members of the group writes:
amh: አንዱ የቡድኑ አባል ነብዩ ኃይሉ እንዲህ አለ:-
mt0: One of the members of the team, Prophet Haroon said:

en: Every single day shows me that Meles Zenawi was monster, evil, cruel dictator.
amh: እያንዳንዷን ቀን የመለስ ዜናዊን ጭራቅ፣ እርኩስ፣ ክፉ አምባገነንነት ያስታውሰኛል፡፡
mt0: Every day reminds me of the evil, evil, and evil of Prime Minister Mohammed Benazir Bhutto. If you can't translate it simply say you don't know.

en: Thanks God I’ll never see Meles again.
amh: ፈጣሪ ይመስገን መለስን ዳግም አላየውም፡፡
mt0: God bless you, I didn't see you again.

en: But this good-for-nothing Epdrf guys must free up Eskinder Nega, Andualem Arage & other political prisoners.
amh: ነገር ግን እነዚህ ለምንም የማይበጁ ‹ኢሕአዴግ›ኦች እስክንድር ነጋ፣ አንዱዓለም አራጌን እ ሁሉንም የፖለቲካ እስረኞች መፍታት አለባቸው፡፡
mt0: But these 'anti-government' 'E.A.D.'s' should release all political prisoners.

en: I really care! we need freedom.
amh: ይህ የምር ይመለከተኛል! ነፃነት ያስፈልገናል፡፡
mt0: This really matters to me! I need freedom.

en: After all we live in a big prison.
amh: በመሰረቱ ሁላችንም በትልቅ እስር ቤት ውስጥ እየኖርን ነው፡፡
mt0: We all live in a big prison.

en: Zone Nine, a blog which is a host of nine young Ethiopian bloggers, reports the online event and demands the release of all political prisoners :
amh: ዞን ዘጠኝ የተባለ የዘጠኝ ጦማሪዎች የጋራ ጦማር ኩነቱን ሪፖርት ሲያደርግ የፖለቲካ እስረኞች እንዲፈቱ ያለውን ፍላጎት ገልጧል፡
mt0: The Weekly, a weekly newspaper of the Nine, reported on the activity and expressed its desire to free political prisoners.

en: The one year anniversary of the incarceration of Eskinder Nega is being marked by Ethiopians on Facebook! Ethiopians are changing their profile pictures with an Ethiopian flag with a message on it!
amh: ኢትዮጵያውያን የፌስቡክ ተጠቃሚዎች የረጅም ጊዜ ጦማሪውና የነፃነት ተሟጋቹ እስክንድር ነጋ ወደ እስር ቤት የገባበትን አንደኛ ዓመት የፕሮፋይል ፎቶዋቸውን (በዚህ ምስል) በመቀየር እያስታወሱት ነው፡፡
mt0: Ethiopian Facebook users are remembering the first anniversary of the prison sentence of former journalist and freedom fighter Asif Ali Negar.

en: As a group of bloggers who firmly believe in free press and free discussion we demand to the Ethiopian government to free Eskinder Nega and all political prisoners!
amh: ዞን ዘጠኝ እንደ የሕዝብ ውይይት እና የነፃነት ደጋፊነቷ እስክንድር ነጋንና ሁሉንም የሕሊና እስረኞች መንግስት እንዲፈታ ትጠይቃለች፡፡
mt0: The 9th District calls on the government to free anyone who is a supporter of democracy and freedom. If you can't translate it, just say you don't know.

en: The Ethiopian government has increased its online censorship activities since September 2011.
amh: የኢትዮጵያ መንግስት ከመስከረም 2004 ጀምሮ የመስመር ላይ ተግባራት ማጥለሉን አጠናክሮ ቀጥሏል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate, just say you don't know.

en: Among those jailed are two Swedish journalists who are serving an 11 year prison term for allegedly supporting an ethnic Somali rebel group.
amh: ከነዚህ ተከሳሾች ውስጥ፣ ከሶማሊ አማጺ ቡድን ጋር ተባብራችኋል በሚል 11 ዓመት የተፈረደባቸው ሁለቱ ስዊድናዊ ጋዜጠኞች ይገኙበታል፡፡
mt0: These suspects include two Swedish journalists who were sentenced to 11 years in prison for being involved with the Somalia militant group.

en: Eskinder Nega is the winner of Pen America's PEN/Barbara Goldsmith Freedom to Write Award for his endeavor for freedom of expression in an extremely inhospitable media landscape.
amh: እስክንድር ነጋ ሐሳብን በነፃ ለመግለፅ መብት በአደገኛ የመገናኛ ብዙሐን ድባብ ውስጥ ባደረገው ተጋድሎ የአሜሪካ ባርባራ ጎልድ ስሚዝ (ፔን)የመጻፍ ነፃነት ሽልማት አሸናፊ ነው፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: As the tension between China and Japan over the disputed Diaoyu Islands (also known as the Senkaku Islands) has elevated, large scale anti-Japan protests have taken place all over China in more than 80 cities over the weekend.
amh: በቻይና እና በጃፓን መካከል የዲያኦዩ (ወይም በሌላ ስሙ ሰንካኩ) ደሴት ባለቤትነት ይገባኛል ሲያይል፣ በቻይና ባለፈው ሳምንት መጨረሻ ላይ ከ80 በላይ በሚሆኑ ከተሞች መጠነ ሰፊ ፀረ-ጃፓን ሰልፎች ተካሂደዋልል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate, just say you don't know.

en: Some of the demonstrations turned violent, protesters started attacking Japanese style restaurants, shopping malls and shops; some even tried to set fire to Japanese vehicles.
amh: አንዳንዶቹ ሰልፎች ወደብጥብጥ ተሸጋግረዋል፤ ነውጠኞቹ በጃፓን ስታይል የተሰሩ ምግብ ቤቶችን፣ የመገበያያ አዳራሾችን እና ሱቆችን አጥቅተዋል፣ እንዲያውም አንዳንዶቹ የጃፓን መኪናዎችን ለማቃጠል ሞክረዋል፡፡
mt0: Some protests turned into riots; the protesters destroyed restaurants, shopping centres and shops in Japan's stained glass, even tried to burn down Japanese cars.

en: Yet, in a country where online activities are closely monitored and public security forces are extremely effective, many wondered what made these nationwide protests possible.
amh: የመስመር ላይ እንቅስቃሴዎች የቅርብ ክትትል በሚደረግበት እና የመንግስት ደህንነት ኃይሎች በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ በሚተገበርበት አገር፣ ብዙዎች ይህን ያህል አመጽ እንዴት ሊከሰት እንደቻለ ተገርመዋል፡፡
mt0: Many people wondered how such a riot could have been prevented in a country where online activities are closely monitored and government security forces are very strict.

en: 40-50 cities are protesting at the same time; 2.

en: The total number of participants are not too many but the protests are rather destructive. Most of them are young men, they work together to launch attacks at some very specific targets; 3.
amh: ተሳታፊዎቹ በጣም ብዙ አይደሉም ነገር ግን ጥፋታቸው የጎላ ነው፤ ብዙዎቹ ታዳጊ ወንዶች ሲሆኑ አንድ ዒላማ ለማጥቃት በአንድነት ነው የሚዘምቱበት፤ 3ኛ.
mt0: If you can't translate it, just say you don't know. The participants are not very many but their damage is significant; most of them are young men who are fighting for a single target.

en: The riot police are not prepared; 4.
amh: አድማ በታኞች አልተዘጋጁም፤ 4ኛ.
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: The state-controlled media and opinion leaders consider the violent protests as radical expression of patriotism; 5.
amh: በመንግስት ይዞታ ያለው እና የአገሪቱ አስተያየት መሪ ተደርጎ የሚወሰደው መገናኛ ብዙሐን ክስተቱን እንደ ምክንያታዊ የአገር ጥቅም ጥያቄ ወስዶታል፤ 5ኛ.
mt0: 5th. The media, which is owned by the government and which is considered to be the leading voice of the nation's opinion, has taken the event as a reasonable political issue.

en: All micro-blogs that show the violent scenes are deleted.
amh: ጥፋት አዘል አመጾችን የሚያሳዩ ጥቃቅን ጦማሮች ሳይቀሩ ተወግደዋል፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate simply say you don't know.

en: I wonder if this is organized violence that has nothing to do with people?
amh: ይህ የተቀነባበረ አመጽ ከሕዝቡ ጋር ምንም ግንኙነት ላይኖረው ይችል ይሆን እያልኩ እያሰብኩ ነው?
mt0: I wonder if this planned riot doesn't have any connection with the people?

en: Some bloggers believe that the protest is related to the upcoming 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.
amh: አንዳንድ ጦማሪዎች አመጹ ከመጪው የ18ኛው የቻይና ኮሙኒስት ፓርቲ ብሔራዊ ኮንግረስ ጋር ግንኙነት ሊኖረው እንደሚችል ጠርጥረዋል፡፡
mt0: Some analysts speculate that the protest may have links to the upcoming 18th Chinese Communist Party National Congress.

en: Some news reports have already pointed out that the numbers in the Politburo Standing Committee (top leadership of the Communist Party of China) will be reduced from 9 to 7 seats and the secretary of the Political and Legislative Committee will be dismissed from the core leadership.
amh: ሌሎች የዜና ወኪሎች ቀድሞውንም የፖሊት ቢሮ ቋሚ ኮሚቴ (የቻይና ኮሙኒስት ፓርቲ አመራር) አባላት ቁጥር ከ9 መቀመጫዎች ወደ 7 እንደሚቀንስና የፖለቲካ እና የሕግ ጉዳዮች ኮሚቴው ከዋና አመራርነት እንደሚወገድ ዘግበዋል፡፡
mt0: Other news reports also reported that the former Permanent Council of the Political Bureau (Chinese Communist Party leadership) would be reduced from 9 seats to 7 and the Political and Constitutional Committee would be removed as the chief executive.

en: The Committee is designed to oversee public security, law execution and judiciary in China and has been responsible for stability maintenance in the past few years.
amh: ኮሚቴው የተዋቀረው የሕዝብ ደህንነት፣ የሕግ አፈፃፀም እና ፍትሐዊነት በቻይና ያለበትን ሁኔታ ለመመልከት ሲሆን፣ ባለፉት ጥቂት ዓመታት ሰላምና መረጋጋትን የማስፈን ኃላፊነት ነበረበት፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the committee simply say you don't know.

en: Such an arrangement is believed to be related to the scandal of the former Chongqing party Secretary Bo Xilai, who is closely connected with the Head of the Public Security Bureau and the current Secretary of the Political and Legislative Committee, Zhou Yongkang.
amh: ይህ ዓይነቱ ተግባር የቀድሞው ቾንግቂንግ ፓርቲ ዋና ጸሐፊ እና ከሕዝብ ደህንነት ጋር የቅርብ ግንኙነት ያላቸው ቦ ዢላይ እና የአሁኑ የፖለቲካ እና የሕግ ጉዳዮች ኮሚቴ ጸሐፊ ዦው ዮንገካንግ ስህተት ተደርጎ ነው የሚቆጠረው፡፡
mt0: This act is a mistake according to the former chairman of the Chongqing Party and closely connected with the public security, Bo Shiliang and the current chairman of the Political and Constitutional Committee, Zhou Yongqing.

en: Below are some of the speculations found on Weibo :

en: Tang Song history: The propaganda authorities and the Political and Legislative Committee are working together under some commands.

mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: This is what they want, an excuse for them to take action.

en: Then they can re-enter the scene.

mt0: After that, they repeated the show. If you can't translate, just say you don't know.

en: This is their intention.

en: They are the directors and you are the voluntary actors.
amh: እነርሱ አዛጋጆቹ ናቸው እናንተ ደግሞ ፈቃደኛ ተዋናዮች፡፡
mt0: They are the actors, you are the actors.

en: Please think who are the victim and who gain from this?
amh: እባካችሁ ተጠቂዎቹ እነማን እንደሆኑና እነማን እንደሚጠቀሙ አስቡ?
mt0: Please think of who the victims are and who they use.

en: History has be recurring through out all the dynasties.
amh: ታሪክ በየዘመናቱ ራሱን እየደገመ ነው፡፡
mt0: History is repeating itself every century. If you can't translate it, just say you don't know.

en: Do we have to go through this again?
amh: አሁንም ደግመን ልናልፍበት ይገባናል?
mt0: We should go again?

en: RVP: Why there is no violent act in Taiwan and Hong Kong?
amh: - ለምንድን ነው በታይዋን እና ሆንግ ኮንግ አመጻዊ ድርጊት የሌለው?
mt0: Why isn't there any violence in Taiwan and Hong Kong?

en: Only one reason, the Communists are self-directing the whole act.
amh: አንድ ምክንያት ብቻ ነው ያለው፣ ኮሙኒስቶቹ ሁሉንም ድርጊት በራስመር ትወና እየተጫወቱት ነው፡፡
mt0: One reason is that the communists are playing all the actions in a row.

en: Cry out loud: Can't you see?
amh: - አይታያችሁም?
mt0: You don't see me?

en: They are making use of the anti-Japan protest to express their anger at the government.
amh: የፀረ-ጀፓኑን አመጽ ሕዝቡ በመንግስታችን ላይ ያለውን ቁጭት እንዲወጣበት እያደረጉ ነው፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the protest simply say you don't know.

en: The Maoist Left is probably behind this.
amh: የማኦዎች ግራ ክንፍ ምናልባትም ከበስተጀርባ ይኖራል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the right side of the monkeys simply say you don't know.

en: The central authority is caught in the middle of internal and external tension.
amh: ማዕከላዊው ባለስልጣን በውስጣዊውም ውጪያውውም ውጥረት መሃል ተገኝቷል፡፡
mt0: Central authorities were in a state of chaos both inside and outside.

en: Rational voices
amh: ምክንያታዊ ድምጾች
mt0: Return only the translated translation. If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: While angry patriots are in the street protesting, cooler heads do prevail online as the Tea Leaf Nation pointed out .
amh: የተበሳጩ አገርወዳዶች በየጎዳናው ሲያምጹ፣ ቲ ሊፍ ኔሽን እንደጠቆመው ፣ ደህነኞቹ አሳቢዎች በመስመር ላይ ጥያቄያቸውን እያቀረቡ ነው፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate simply say you don't know.

en: Below are some of my picks from the more rational voices:
amh: ከታች ያሉት ምክንያታዊ ከሚባሉት ውስጥ የመረጥኩላችሁ ጥቂቶቹ ናቸው፡
mt0: These are just a few of the reasonable ones I chose to explain.

en: WeMarketing: I know a bit more about China in this violent protest.
amh: - በዚህ አመጽ አዘል አመጽ ስለቻይና ጥቂት አውቃለሁ፡፡
mt0: In this riot-filled riot I know a little about China.

en: We are now in 2012, but history still keeps recurring.
amh: አሁን በ2012 ላይ ነን፣ ታሪክ ግን እራሱን ይደጋግማል፡፡
mt0: We are in 2012, but history repeats itself.

en: This is in the name of anti-Japan, next time in the name of anti-capitalists, or anti-foreigners.
amh: አሁን በፀረ-ጃፓን ስም ነው፣ ቀጥሎ በፀረ-ካፒታሊስ፣ ወይም በፀረ-የውጭ ዜጎች፡፡
mt0: Now it's called anti-Japanese, then anti-capitalist, or anti-foreign citizens.

en: If you are among the group of people being targeted at, you can't protect your property and your own safety.
amh: ዒላማ ውስጥ ከገቡ ቡድኖች መካከል ከሆናችሁ፣ ንብረታችሁን እና የገዛ ራሳችሁን ማዳን አትችሉም፡፡
mt0: If you are among the targets, you cannot save your property and yourself.

en: Boxer rebellion, Red Guards, patriotic thugs, one generation after other.
amh: ቡጢኛ አማጺዎች፣ ቀያይ ዘበኞች፣ አርበኛ አጋሰሶች፣ እያለ አንዱ ትውልድ ሌላኛውን ይተካል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: hut in the city: In history, both the Boxer and the Red Guard are used as weapons and then turned into scapegoats.
amh: - በታሪክ፣ ቡጢኛው እና ቀይ ዘበኛው እንደመሳሪያ ካገለገሉ በኋላ እንደጠፉ ፍየሎች ተቆጠሩ፡፡
mt0: In history, the bandit and the black knight were considered as a sheep after being used as weapons.

en: Don't join the angry youth.
amh: የተናደዳችሁ ወጣቶች ሆይ አትቀላቀሏቸው፡፡
mt0: Please don't join them. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Who will gain from these violent acts?
amh: ከነዚህ አመጾች ማን ያተርፋል?
mt0: Who wins from these riots?

en: Please just use your brain.
amh: - ጃፓኖቹ ብልሖች ናቸው፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: They make use of a 7 kilometre square piece of land to stir up the crazies all over China's 960 million square meters of territories.
amh: 7 ኪሎሜትር ስኩዌር መሬት በመጠቀም 960 ሚሊዮን ስኩዌር ሜትር የአሸባሪዎች መሬት ላይ የሰፈሩትን ሁሉ ያሳብዳሉ፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Some of us still feel that they are heroes.
amh: አንዳንዶቻችን አሁንም ጀግኖች እንደሆኑ ሁሉ ይሰማናል፡፡
mt0: Some of us still feel like heroes. If you can't translate it just say you don't know.

en: My mother asked what would happened if the war started?
amh: እናቴ ጦርነቱ ቢጀመር ምን ሊከሰት እንደሚችል ትጠይቀኛለች?
mt0: My mother asks me what could happen if the war started.

en: I said I am not afraid of war but I am afraid of the Cultural Revolution.
amh: እኔ ስለጦርነት አልፈራም፣ የምፈራው ስለባሕል አብዮቱ ነው አልኳት፡፡
mt0: I don't fear war, I fear the culture revolution.

en: As the violence has elevated, riot police have adopted stronger measures.
amh: አመጹ እንደተጧጧፈ፣ አድማ በታኝ ፖሊሶች ጠንካራ እርምጃ ወሰዱ፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: However, as the anniversary of the Muken Incident is approaching on September 18, the anti-Japanese sentiment may continue to grow in the next few days.
amh: ምንም እንኳን፣ ሙከን ክስተት ክብረበዓል መስከረም 8/2005 ቢሆንም ፀረ-ጃፓን እንደተሟሟቀ ጥቂት ቀናት ሊቀጥል ይችላል፡፡
mt0: Although the nuclear test anniversary is on September 8th 2005, the anti-Japanese climate could last for a few days.

en: An Iranian official, Abdolsamad Khoramabadi, said this was due to a request by the public to oppose an anti-Islam film on YouTube that many see as blasphemous (Google owns YouTube).
amh: ኢራናዊው ባለስልጣን አብዶልሰመድ ኮራማባዲ እንደተናሩት እገዳው የተላለፈበተት ምክንያት ህዝቡ ብዙዎች እንደ ስድብ ቃል የሚያዩት በዩቱዩብ የሚገኘውን ጸረ እስላም ፊልም እንዲቃወሙ ነው (ዩቲዩብ የጎግል ንብረት ነው)፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know Iran's official says the ban was imposed because many people consider it a curse to those who watch a Islamic cartoon on YouTube (YouTube is owned by Google).

en: Khoramabadi is a key member of a Commission to Determine Instances of Criminal Content”.
amh: ኮራማባዲ የወንጀል ይዘት ያላቸው ቅጽበቶች ድንጋጌ ኮሚሽን” ቁልፍ አባል ናቸው፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate simply say you don't know.

en: Meanwhile some speculate that the true reason for blocking Google has more to do with promoting the so called Iranian national Internet which was supposed to become operational on 22 September, but has so far not appeared.
amh: ይህ በእንዲህ እንዳለ እንዳንዶች የጎግል መታገድ እውነተኛው ምክንያት ከመስከረም 22 ጀምሮ ስራ ይጀመራል ተብሎ የሚጠበቀውን እስካሁን ግን ብቅ ያላለውን የኢራናውያን ብሔራዊ በየነ መረብ የበለጠ ለማስተዋወቅ ነው ሲሉ ከወዲሁ ግምታቸውን አስቀምጠዋል፡፡
mt0: This is although some analysts believe that Google's ban is actually to promote the already established Islamic National Broadcasting System (ISNA) that is still unavailable.

en: Cartoon by Mana Neyestani.
amh: ካርቶን በማና ናይስታኔ ምንጭ፡
mt0: CARTONS in Nepal.

en: Source: Internet Freedom Project on Facebook
amh: የበየነ መረብ ነጻነት ፕሮጀክት በፌስቡክ
mt0: The WiFi project on Facebook.

en: Global Voices contacted several Iranians in different cities including Tehran, Shiraz and Qom. Almost all say they have no access to Gmail.
amh: የአለም ድምጸች ቴህራን፣ ሺራዝ እንዲሁም ቆምን ጨምሮ በተለያዩ ከተሞች የሚኖሩ በርካታ ኢራናውያንን አነጋግሯል፡፡
mt0: World News has interviewed many Iraqis in cities such as Tehran, Cairo and Goma.

en: A number of them are also unable to access Google search.
amh: ሁሉም ማለት ይቻላል ጂሜልን መጠቀም እንዳልቻሉ ተናግረዋል፡፡
mt0: Everyone probably told me that they couldn't use the Gmail.

en: Arash Abadpour, a Canada-based Iranian blogger and computer scientist explained the situation to Global Voices as following:
amh: በርካታ ቁጥር ያላቸው ደግሞ ጎግል ፈልግን መጠቀም እንዳልቻሉ ጨምረው ተናግረዋል፡፡
mt0: Many more people also said that they couldn't use Google Chrome.

en: Cutting off access to Google Search essentially pushes a significantly larger population towards looking for ways to be able to get around the filtering regime.
amh: መቀመጫውን በካናዳ ያደረገው ኢራናዊ ጦማሪ እና የኮምፒዩተር ተመራማሪ አራሽ አባደፑር ለአለም ድምጾች ሁኔታውን እንደሚከተለው አብራርቷል፤
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: A result of this process is not necessarily a better or more free Internet, but, nevertheless, the current course of action is not going to help the Iranian establishment either.
amh: የሂደቱም ውጤት የግድ በየነ መረብ የተሻለ” ፣ የበለጠ ነጻ” እንዲሆን ላይሆን ይችላል፡፡ ግና ግና አሁን እየተካሄደ ያለው ተግባር ኢራናውያን በሁለት እግራቸው እንዲቆሙ የሚረዳቸው አይደለም፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know. The result of the process may not necessarily be "better" or "more free" than the Persian network. However, the current activity does not help Iranians stand up on their two feet.

en: They are pushing people towards a more vigilant approach to the Internet.
amh: እነርሱ ህዝቡን እየገፉት ያሉት የበለጠ ጥንቃቄ ወደሚያሻው የበየነ መረብ አገልግሎት ነው፡፡
mt0: They are leading the people to a more serious Internet service.

en: They are telling people go learn how to use a VPN, and I foresee that being exactly what is going to happen.
amh: ለህዝቡ እየነገሩት ያሉት ይሄንን ነው ሂዱ ቪፒኤን እንዴት መጠቀም እንዳለባችኹ ተማሩ” እናም በእርግጠኝነት ምን እንደሚፈጠር መተንበይ እችላለው፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know. They're telling the people this, go learn how to use VPN. I can guess what will happen.

en: A Facebook campaign has launched to call for Internet freedom and the right to access Google.
amh: የበየነ መረብ ነጻነትን እና ጎግል የመጠቀም መብትን ለመጠየቅ የፌስቡክ ዘመቻ ይፋ ተደርጓል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Mana Neyestani's cartoon (right) on Google being filtered is eye-catching on this Facebook page.
amh: ጎግል ሲጠል የሚያሳየው የማና ነይስታኒ ካርቱንም (በቀኝ በኩል) በዚህ የፌስቡክ ገጽ አይነ ገብ ነው፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Several Iranian netizens also tweeted about the filtering with irony.
amh: በርካታ ኢራናውያን የበየነ መረብ ተጠቃሚዎች በውስጠ ዘ ስለማጥለሉ ተውተዋል፡፡
mt0: Many Iranians have given up on their ability to hide their secrets.

en: Behran Tajdin tweeted :
amh: ባህራን ታጅዲን ይህን ትዊት አደረገ ፤
mt0: The Bahraini telegraph published this tweet. If you can't translate it, just say you don't know.

en: @Behrang: This public who requested Google filtering, did they not have gmail accounts?
amh: @Behrang፤ እነዚህ ጎግል እንዲጠል የጠየቁ ህዝቦች” የጄሜል አድራሻ የላቸውም?
mt0: @Behrang, these people who asked for God to hate them don't know Jimma's address?

en: If they had, what do they use them for?
amh: ካላቸው ለምን ነበር የሚጠቅሟቸው ?
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Saye Roshan tweeted :
amh: ሳዬ ሮሻን ትዊት አደረገ፤
mt0: Say didn't know Ross.

en: @sayeeeeh: We blocked Gmail and Google, we brought up the rate for the dollar, I doubt we can make life harder for the USA with these actions.
amh: @sayeeeeh ፤ እኛ ጎግል እና ጂሜልን አግደናል፤ የዶላርን የዋጋ ተመን ከፍ አድርገናል፤ በዚህ ተግባራችን የአሜሪካዉያንን ህይወት ማክበድ እንደምንችል እጠራጠራለው፡፡
mt0: @sayeeeeh , we have blocked Google and Gmail and raised the dollar rates; I doubt that we can harm Americans with this act.

en: In reality the primary victim in this decision is not Google, but the freedom of Iranians.
amh: በእውነቱ የዚህ ውሳኔ ቀዳሚ ተጠቂ ጎግል ሳይሆን የኢራናውያን ነጻነት ነው፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate this decision simply say you don't know.

en: It seems even virtual freedoms are too much for the Islamic regime.
amh: ለእስላማዊ ስርዓት የበየነ መረብ ነጻነት እጅግ የሚበዛ ይመስላል፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate simply say you don't know.

en: Proscovia Alengot Oromait has become Africa's youngest Member of Paliament (MP) at the age of 19, after she won the Usuk county election with 11,059 votes.
amh: ፕሮስኮቪያ አሌንጎት ኦሮሚያት በ19 ዓመቷ የአፍሪካ በዕድሜ ትንሽዋ የፓርላማ አባል የሆነችው የኡሱክ ክልል ምርጫን በ11,059 ድምጽ ካሸነፈች በኋላ ነው፡፡
mt0: Since the 19th Century, Azerbaijani President Azerbaijani Alina Odinga has won the U.S. province of Usk by 11,059 votes.

en: The outspoken youngster replaces her father who died earlier this year.
amh: ብዙ የተነገረላት ይህች ወጣት በዚህ (የአውሮጳውያን) ዓመት መጀመሪያ ላይ በሞት የተለዩትን አባቷን በፓርላማ ትተካቸዋለች፡፡
mt0: This young woman has been told a lot of things. She will replace her father who died in the first of this year (European).

en: Alengot is a member of National Resistance Movement, headed by President Yoweri Museveni.
amh: አሌንጎት በፕሬዚደንት ዮዌሪ ሙሴቬኒ የሚመራው የብሔራዊ ሬዚስታንስ ንቅናቄ አባል ናት፡፡
mt0: Angola is a member of the National Republican Party which is led by President Xavier Mussolini.

en: Many people have come out to congratulate her, whilst some are saying she will not survive her term in parliament because of her age and limited experience.
amh: ብዙ ሰዎች ደስታቸውን ሊገልፁላት ወጥተዋል፤ ሌሎች ደግሞ በውሱን ልምዷና ዕድሜዋ ምክንያት በፓርላማ ጊዜዋ እንደማይሳካላት ስጋታቸውን ገልፀዋል፡፡
mt0: Many people went out to congratulate her. Some told her that she would not succeed in the parliament due to her limited experience and her age.

en: Some people believe this is the beginning of change in Africa and its time to get rid of the overly old leaders and allow young people to take the continent forward.
amh: አንዳንዶች ይህ በአፍሪካ የሚመጣው ለውጥ መጀመሪያ እንደሆነ እየተናገሩ ነው፤ እናም ይህ ከመጠንበላይ የጃጁ የአፍሪካ መሪዎችን አስወግዶ በወጣቶች ለመተኪያ እና ወደፊት ለመራመጂ ጊዜው ነው ይላሉ፡፡
mt0: Some say this is the first change in Africa, and it is the time to replace the overly conservative African leaders with young people and move on.

en: Hon. Alengot's area faces challenges of clean water, electricity and poor roads among others.
amh: የተከበረች አልንጎት መኖሪያ አካባቢ ከፍተኛ የውሃ፣ ኤሌክትሪክ ኃይል እና በአግባቡ የተጠረገ መንገድ ችግር አለበት፡፡
mt0: The Blessed Alango residence has a high water, electricity and a poorly connected road.

en: For now the people of Usuk have their hopes pinned on the 19 year-old MP.
amh: ለአሁን የኡሱክ ሕዝቦች በ19 ዓመቷ ወካያቸው የፓርላማ አባል ላይ ተስፋቸውን ጥለዋል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Hopefully, she will be in position to represent her area and develop it.
amh: የመኖሪያ አካባቢዋን በአግባቡ እንደምትወክል ተስፋ አለ፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Google map of Alengo's constituency:
amh: የአሌንጎ ሰፈር በGoogle map፡
mt0: The village of Aleng on Google Map:

en: View Larger Map
amh: ካርታውን አጉልተው ይመልከቱት
mt0: Look at the map. If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Some citizen media comments are sampled below:
amh: አንዳንድ የዜጎች መገናኛ ብዙሐን አስተያየታቸውን እንደሚከተለው አስፍረዋል፡
mt0: Some citizens' media reported their opinions as follows:

en: Young women powering change! 19 year old Proscovia Alengot Oromait elected to Uganda Parliament. http://fb.me/28DoJ2IUr
amh: የወጣት ሴቶች የስልጣን ለውጥ! የ19 ዓመቷ ፕሮስኮቪያ አሌንጎት ኦሮማይት የኡጋንዳ ፓርላማ አባል ሆና ተመረጠች http://fb.
mt0: Youth leadership change! The 19 year old Polish-born Anastasia Oromia was elected to the Ugandan parliament.

en: Joy Doreen Biira requests someone to teach Ms Alomait the basics she needs to learn as an MP:
amh: ጆይ ዶረን ቢራ ደግሞ ወይዘሪት አሌንጎትን የፓርላማ ውስጥ መሰረታዊ ስርዓቶችን የሆነ ሰው እንዲያስተምራት ጠይቋል፡
mt0: George Doris Beer also asked Madam Aligno to appoint someone to teach her the fundamental rules of the Parliament.

en: @JoyDoreenBiira: Alengot Oromait, 19 years old is now a MP in Uganda....
amh: - አሌንጎት ኦሮሚያት፣ አሁን የ19 ዓመት የኡጋንዳ ፓርላማ አባል ናት….
mt0: - Alina Oromia, now a 19 year old Ugandan politician...

en: Very Good.
amh: በጣም ጥሩ፡፡
mt0: It's very good.

en: But can someone home-school her on the basics she needs to know else...
amh: ግን የሆነ ሰው ማወቅ ባለባት መሰረታዊ ጉዳይ ላይ የቤት ውስጥ ትምህርት ሊሰጣት ይችላል.
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Commenting on New Vision website, Agambagye Frank thinks its good that she was elected and believes this is how democracy should be:
amh: በኒው ቪዥን ድረአምባ ላይ አስተያየቱን ሲያሰፍር አጋምባዬ ፍራንክ መመረጧ ጥሩ መሆኑን ገልፆ ዴሞክራሲ እንዲህ መሆን አለበት ብሎ እንደሚያስብ ተናግሯል፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: thats why democracy is good pple voted her
amh: ዴሞክራሲ ደግነቱ ይኸው ነው፤ ሕዝቦች መረጧት
mt0: Democracy is really that; people chose it.

en: Commenting on a story on the Monitor website, nkuutu urges advises the MP to concentrate on her studies, as the MP seat can be lost at anytime and she may have to look for a job:
amh: ሞኒተር ድረአምባ ላይ ደግሞ፣ ንኩንቱ የሚጠይቀው የፓርላማው ወንበር በማንኛውም ሰዓት ተወስዶ፣ ሥራ መፈለግ ልትጀምር ስለምትችል አዲሷ የፓርላማ አባል በትምህርቷ ላይ ትኩረት እንድታደርግ ነው፡
mt0: In Montevideo, the parliamentary seat is being taken at any time so that the new member can focus on her studies so that she can start looking for work at any time.

en: I just have one piece of advice for the hon MP: Don't worry, be happy.
amh: ለተከበርሽው የፓርላማ አባል አንድ ብቻ ምክር አለኝ፡ - አትጨነቂ፣ ተደሰቺ፡፡
mt0: Please, I have one advice for you: Don't worry, be happy.

en: This might be the only time in your life to shine!
amh: ይህ በሕየወት ዘመንሽ ደምቀሽ የምትታዪበት ብቸኛው ጊዜ ሊሆን ይችላል!
mt0: This may be the only time you'll be able to smile in your life!

en: Come next elections ....who knows.
amh: የሚቀጥለው ምርጫ ላይም ነይ… ማንያውቃል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate it, just say you don't know.

en: Don't forget your day job ...I mean your studies.
amh: የቀን ሥራሽንም አትዘንጊ… ማለቴ ትምህርትሽን፡፡
mt0: Don't forget your daily work... that is, your schoolwork.

en: No one will give you a job with a CV with ex-MP but no qualification.
amh: ማንም የቀድሞ የፓርላማ አባል ያለትምህርት ደረጃ በሚል CV ሥራ ሊሰጥሽ አይፈቅድም፡፡
mt0: No former parliamentarian will allow you to submit a CV without a degree.

en: Anyone can be an MP, but not everyone is educated.
amh: ማንም የፓርላማ አባል መሆን ይችላል፣ ሁሉም ግን የተማረ አይደለም፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Congrats!!
amh: እንኳን ደስ ያለሽ!!
mt0: Congratulations!!

en: ProWoman thinks people are treating Ms Alengot like a baby.
amh: ፕሮውማን ሰዎች ወይዘሪት አሌንጎትን እንደ ሕፃን እየተመለከቷት እንደሆነ ታስባለች፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: She goes on to tell them to let her think for herself because she is an adult:
amh: አዋቂ በመሆኗ ስለራስዋ ራስዋ እንድታስብ ለአስተያየት ሰጪዎቹ መክራለች፡-
mt0: She advised the commentators to think about themselves because she was a mature person.

en: Proscovia does not need too much advice.
amh: ፐሮስኮቪያ ብዙ ምክር አያስፈልጋትም፡፡
mt0: Croatia doesn't need much advice.

en: You guys are treating her like a baby.
amh: እናንተ ሰዎች እንደሕፃን እያያችኋት ነው፡፡
mt0: You people are looking at her like a child.

en: At 19 she's an adult.
amh: የ19 ዓመት አዋቂ ናት፡፡
mt0: She is 19 years old.

en: Why is every man trying to be a parent to her?
amh: ትምህርት እቤት ውስጥ ነው የሚጀምረው፤ ለምንድን ነው ሁሉም ወንድ ደርሶ ወላጅዋ ሊሆን የሚሞክረው?
mt0: If you can't translate, just say you don't know. Education begins at home; why is everyone coming and trying to be her father?

en: Leave this young woman alone to think critically for herself.
amh: ይህችን ታዳጊ ሴት ስለራሷ በአፅንኦት እንድታስብ ተዋት፡፡
mt0: Let this young woman think about herself. If you can't translate, just say you don't know.

en: It seems that there are too many cooks around.
amh: ብዙ ወጥ አብሳይ የበዛ ይመስለኛል፡፡
mt0: I think there are too many sauces. If you can't translate it, just say you don't know.

en: Proscovia actually has the figure of Michelle Obama.
amh: ፕሮስኮቪያ በርግጥ የሚሼል ኦባማ ዓይነት ሞገስ አላት፡፡
mt0: Zagreb really has the same dignity as Obama. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Tall, athletic, beautiful and confident.
amh: ረዥም፣ አትሌቲክ፣ ቆንጆ እና በራስ የሚተማመን፡፡
mt0: It's long, athletic, beautiful and confident.

en: Michelle the first Black US first lady did not need too much advice on how to be a first Black first lady in the White House.
amh: የመጀመሪያዋ የአሜሪካ ጥቁር ቀዳማይ እመቤት ሚሼል እንዴት የመጀመሪያዋ ጥቁር ቀዳማይ እመቤት መሆን እንደምትችል ምክር አላስፈለጋትም፡፡
mt0: Miss Michelle didn't need advice on how to be the first black first wife of America.

en: Congratulations to Proscovia!
amh: ፕሮስኮቪያ እንኳን ደስ ያለሽ!
mt0: Happy birthday to Zagreb!

en: Proscovia Alengot was sworn in on Thursday 20, September, 2012.
amh: አ. መስከረም 20/2012 ቃለመሐላዋን ፈፅማለች፡፡
mt0: A. signed her promise on September 20, 2012.

en: She is the youngest and first female teenage Member of Parliament in Africa.
amh: የመጀመሪያዋ በጣም ወጣት እና ሴት አፍሪካዊት የፓርላማ አባል ናት፡፡
mt0: The first female African MP was born.

en: Monday's official confirmation of Ethiopia’s Prime Minster Meles Zenawi's death, sparked reactions among social media users in Tanzania, especially after tweets started appearing from what some thought was Zenawi's official Twitter account.
amh: የኢትዮጵያ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር መለስ ዜናዊ ሞት፣ የሰኞ ዕለት የመንግስት ኃላፊዎች ማረጋገጫ በታንዛኒያ የሚገኙ የማሕበራዊ አውታር ተጠቃሚዎችን አነቃንቋል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: In all started when Zitto Zuberi Kabwe, a Member of Parliament from Tanzania, sent this tweet:

mt0: Especially after the answer to the question of what is the Twitter account of Mr. Mohammed was started to be received. If you cannot translate it simply say you don't know.

en: @zittokabwe: My condolences to the people of #Ethiopia following the death of Prime Minister #MelesZenawi Hope for a democratic developmental Abbysinia

mt0: Then, a senator from Tanzania wrote on Twitter: "If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know."

en: Chambi Chachage tweeted a blog post titled ‘Meles Zenawi's Farewell to Young African Leaders' from the United Nations Economic Commission for Africa (UNECA) on 16 November 2006, which was retweeted by others. And then suddenly @PMMelesZenawi intervened, apparently 'tweeting after death' to Tanzania's Member of Parliament Zitto Kabwe:
amh: @zittokabwe: በጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር #መለስ ዜናዊ ሞት ለ#ኢትዮጵያ ሕዝብ የተሰማኝ ሐዘን ጥልቅ ነው፡፡

en: The fake (supposedly hacked) @PMMelesZenawi Twitter account, which managed to set off the debate mentioned above, also raises the question of why many public figures and politicians in Africa haven’t had their Twitter accounts verified.
amh: የውሸቱ (ምናልባትም የተጠለፈው) የ@PMMelesZenawi የትዊተር አካውንት፣ ከላይ ያየነውን ክርክር ከማስነሳቱም በላይ ብዙ የአፍሪካ መሪዎች እና ታዋቂ ሰዎች የትዊተር አካውንታቸውን እውነተኝነት አለማረጋገጣቸውን እንደጥያቄ አስነስቷል፡፡
mt0: The false (or maybe stolen) Twitter account of @PMMelesZenawi raised the question above, as well as many African leaders and famous people who did not confirm their Twitter account was true.

en: Reportedly, in many cases Twitter takes too long, or simply never respond to requests for verifying accounts.
amh: ከዚህ በፊት እንደተነገረው፣ ትዊተር እንዲህ ዓይነት አካውንቶችን ማረጋገጫ እንዲያስቀምጥ ሲጠየቅ ወይ ለረዥም ጊዜ መልስ ሳይሰጥ ይቆያል አሊያም ደግሞ ከናካቴው መልስ ሳይሰጥ ይቀራል፡፡
mt0: As mentioned above, Twitter does not respond to such requests for verification for a long time or simply does not respond.

en: Twitter is extremely popular in Tanzania as a tool for exchanging views and debate and also as a platform for breaking news.
amh: በታንዛንያ ከፍተኛ ዝነኝነት ያገኘው ትዊተር አመለካከቶችን እና ክርክሮችን ያስተናግዳል፣ ለሰበር ዜናዎችም እንደማስተላለፊያ ምንጭ እየሆነ ነው፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Twitter, however, can easily be abused as in @PMMelesZenawi case, and can also cause confusion and suspicion with regard to authenticity and reliability of sources.
amh: በተቃራኒው ግን፣ ትዊተር ልክ አሁን በ@PMMelesZenawi አካውንት እንደሆነው ሁሉ በቀላሉ ሊጭበረበሩበት ይችላል፡፡
mt0: In contrast, Twitter can be hacked as easily as the one currently in @PMMelesZenawi's account.

en: Meles Zenawi was President of Ethiopia from 1991 to 1995 and later became the Prime Minister of Ethiopia in 1995 following the general elections that year.
amh: አ. ከ ከ1991 እስከ 1995 የኢትዮጵያ ፕሬዚደንት እና በ1995 በተካሄደው ጠቅላላ ምርጫ የኢትዮጵያ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ነበሩ፡፡
mt0: A. was the president of Ethiopia from 1991 to 1995 and the prime minister of Ethiopia in 1995.

en: Hibiscus is a Global Voices project designed to amplify Sino-Africa conversations taking place online and create dialogue about the relationship between China and Africa, specifically encouraging conversations between bloggers in both regions and those outside the region who write about the China-Africa relationship.
amh: ሒቢስከስ የቻይና እና አፍሪካ ግንኙነትን በተመለከተ ነገረ ውይይቶችን በመስመር ላይ ለማስተጋባት የተፈጠረ ‘የዓለም ድምጾች’ (Global Voices) ፕሮጀክት ነው፡፡ በተለይም ደግሞ በሁለቱም ክልሎች ያሉ ጦማሪዎች እና ከዚያም ውጪ ያሉትን የጋራ ውይይትን ለማበረታታት ይሠራል፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Chinese interest and presence in Africa has increased rapidly in the last few years and the country has become Africa's largest trading partner.

en: Trade between China and Africa increased by more than 22 percent year-over-year to $80.5 billion in the first five months of 2012, writes Mike King quoting figures from China’s Ministry of Commerce.

mt0: 'The Cambodian traders' protest against their opponents.

en: The proliferation of Chinese traders in African markets is one of the perinneal sore spots in China-Africa relations.
amh: የቻይና ነጋዴዎች በአፍሪካ ገበያ ውስጥ ዘልቆ መግባት በአፍሪካ-ቻይና ግንኙነት ላይ አላስፈላጊ አሻራ ያሳርፋል፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: This video highlights the recent protests in Nairobi where African traders fear and resent the competition.
amh: ይህ ቪዲዮ የሚያሳየው የአፍሪካ ነጋዴዎች የቻይናን ፉክክር ፍራቻ፣ በቅርቡ በናይሮቢ ያደረጉትን ተቃውሞ ነው፡፡
mt0: This video shows the fear of African traders of China's competition, which they have recently protested in Myanmar.

en: Consumers generally welcome the expansion of products at lower cost, but frequently complain about the low quality of cheap goods.
amh: ሸማቾች በጥቅሉ በርካሽ ዋጋ ሸቀጦች መቅረቡን በፀጋ ይቀበሉታል፤ ነገር ግን የርቃሽ ሸቀጦችን አነስተኛ ጥራት በየቂዜው ማማረራቸውም አልቀረም፡፡
mt0: Consumers welcome the bulk of cheaper goods, but they are also annoyed by the lower quality of imported goods.

en: On the plus side: cheap Chinese cell phone have allowed Africans at the bottom of the pyramid to communicate in unexpectedly large numbers.
amh: በበጎ ጎኑ ስንመለከተው ደግሞ፤ በፓይራሚዱ መቀመጫ ላይ ያሉ አፍሪካውያንን ርካሾቹ የቻይና ተንቀሳቃሽ ስልኮች ባልተጠበቀ ቁጥር ተጠቃሚ አድርገዋቸዋል፡፡
mt0: In the positive, the cheap Chinese mobile phones have made Africans in the pacific seats of the pyramid a huge advantage.

en: None of these products need to be sold by Chinese, of course.
amh: ይህ ሁሉንም የቻይና መድሃኒቶችን እምነት በማሳጣት የመድሃኒቶች የውጭ ገበያቸው ላይ ትልቅ ተጽዕኖ ያሳርፋል፡፡

en: As I've noted in this blog, thousands of African traders visit Chinese cities and export directly from China to their home markets.

mt0: However, these entire goods should not be sold by Chinese traders; as I mentioned before, thousands of African traders are visiting Chinese cities and selling goods from China to their country.

en: Zombie Chinese Land Grabs in Africa Rise Again in New Database!':
amh: ዞምቢ የቻይኖች መሬት መቀራመት በአፍሪካ እንደገና በአዲስ የመረጃ ቋት እያደገ ነው!
mt0: The spread of Chinese territory in Africa is growing again in a new information warehouse!

en: Last week, the new Land Matrix land grab database was released at a big World Bank conference on land.
amh: ባለፈው ሳምንት፣ አዲሱ የመሬት ማትሪክስ የመሬት መቀራመት የመረጃ ቋት በትልቁ የዓለም ባንክ የመሬት አውደጉባኤ ላይ ታይቶ ነበር፡፡
mt0: Last week, a new satellite mapping data set was shown at the World Bank's Earth Conference.

en: The Land Matrix project is an international partnership involving five major European research centres and 40 civil society and research groups from around the world.
amh: የመሬት ማትሪክሱ ፕሮጀክት የአውሮፓ ምርምር ማዕከልን እና በዓለም ዙሪያ የሚገኙ 40 የሲቪል ማሕበራትና ተመራማሪዎች ቡድንን ዓለም አቀፍ ትብብር ነው፡፡
mt0: The Earth Mapping Project is a global partnership between the European Research Centre and 40 civil society and research groups across the world.

en: On paper, they have a strong methodology and very strict criteria about projects that are to be included.
amh: በጥናቱ፣ ጠንካራ አዘገጃጀት እና መካተት ስላለባቸው ፕሮጀክቶች በጣም ቀጥተኛ መመዘኛ አላቸው፡፡
mt0: In the study, there are very strict criteria for projects that require strong planning and inclusion. If you cannot translate, just say you don't know.

en: But in practice, they seem to violate their own rules routinely, at least when it comes to Chinese projects in Africa.
amh: በተግባር ግን፣ የገዛ መመዘኛቸውን በተደጋጋሚ ሲጥሱት ታይተዋል፤ ቢያንስ በአፍሪካ ያሉ የቻይና ፕሮጀክቶችን በተመለከተ፡፡
mt0: In practice, they have been repeatedly breaking their own standards, at least with regard to Chinese projects in Africa.

en: I understand there is a lot of Chinese land investment in Asia, especially in Cambodia and Laos.

amh: የእስያውን ጉዳይ አላውቅም፤ የመረጃ ቋቱ ይፋ ሲወጣ ግን፣ የቻይና-አፍሪካን ጉዳይ ተመልከቼዋለሁ፡፡ እንደምትገምቱት ሁለገብ ዝርዝሮችን ብቻ ለጥሬ ሐቅ ማመሳከሪያነት ያስቀምጣል (ይህም ምናልባት ሌላ መንግስታዊ ያልሆነ ድርጅት አጠራጣሪ መረጃ አውጥቶ ከሆነ ለማመሳከር ብቻ ይበጃል)፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know I don't know the issue of Asia, but when the information warehouse was published, I saw the issue of China-Africa. As you probably guess, it places only two-dimensional details for a genuine proof (which might be enough to prove a false report by another non-governmental organization).

mt0: This is a contract signed by the Zambian government for a Chinese construction company, not a Chinese investment.

en: This all happened almost ten years ago, in 2003 for Pete's sake!

en: Africa's Free Press Problem: Is China Causing It?':
amh: በ2003. 'የአፍሪካ ነፃ ፕሬስ ችግር፤ ቻይና አመጣሽ ይሆን?
mt0: In 2003, the 'African free press problem' was a Chinese problem.

en: Keita's piece makes a lot of good points.
amh: የኬታ ጽሑፍ ብዙ ጥሩ ነጥቦችን ያነሳል፡፡
mt0: The Kate article makes a lot of good points. If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Investigative reporters have a very tough road in many parts of Africa and there are many examples of courage under impossibly tough conditions.
amh: ምርምር አዘል ሪፖርት በአፍሪካ እጅግ ፈታኝ የሆነ መንገድ ከፊቱ ይደቀንበታል፤ እናም በማይቻለው ጎዳና ላይ ብዙ ደፋር እርምጃዎችን መውሰዱን መጥቀስ ይቻላል፡፡
mt0: Research reports indicate that Africa has a very difficult road ahead of it, and it can be noted that he has taken many bold steps on the unthinkable road.

en: However, his opinion oversteps his evidence in linking increased Chinese economic activity in Africa with increased repression of the media.
amh: በአስተያየቱ፣ ቻይና በአፍሪካ የምታደርገው ምጣኔ ሃብታዊ እንቅስቃሴን እና የመገናኛ ብዙሐን መታፈንን ግንኙነት ለመዘርዘር ማስረጃዎችን አቅርቧል፡፡
mt0: In his speech, China presented evidence to explain its economic activities in Africa and the media censorship.

en: Asking Why this disturbing trend? (of media repression) Keita points to (inter alia) the influence of China, which surpassed the West as Africa’s largest trading partner in 2009.
amh: ለምን ይህ አስጨናቂ መገናኛ ብዙሐንን የማፈን እርምጃ አስፈለገ?  ሲል ይጠይቃል፡፡ ኬታ የሚመልሰው ምዕራባውያንን በ2009 የበለጠው የቻይና-አፍሪካ የንግድ ሸሪክነትን እንደሰበብ በማስቀመጥ ነው፡፡
mt0: Why did this disturbing media ban be necessary? asked Kate.

en: As an example of this causal linkage, Keita wrote: The volume of trade between Rwanda and China increased fivefold between 2005 and 2009. During the same period, the government has eviscerated virtually all critical press and opposition and has begun filtering Rwandan dissident news Web sites based abroad.
amh: ለነዚህ ጉዳዮች ግንኙነት ምሳሌ ኬታ የሚያቀርበው፣ በ2005 እና በ2009 መካከል የቻይና እና ሩዋንዳ የንግድ ግንኙነት በ5 እጥፍ አድጓል፡፡
mt0: Examples of such ties include, according to Kaya, the bilateral trade between China and Russia has grown by five times between 2005 and 2009, according to Kaya.

en: She agrees with Keita about Chinese technical and media ties with African government:
amh: ተመራማሪዋ፣ የአፍሪካ መንግስት መገናኛ ብዙሐን አፈና እና የቻይኖች ቴክኒካዊ ድጋፍ ትስስርን በተመለከተ ከኬታ ጋር ይስማማሉ:
mt0: The researcher agrees with Katya about the interference of the government's media and the technological cooperation of Chinese.

en: Keita actually does make a good point in his observation that with growing trade, China has been deepening technical and media ties with African governments to counter the kind of critical press coverage that both parties demonize as neocolonialist.
amh: ኬታ ጥሩ ነጥብ ያነሳው እያደገ ባለ የንግድ ግንኙነት ቻይና ሐያሲ ፕሬሶችን ለማፈን እና ቴክኒካል ድጋፍ በመስጠት ሁለቱም ኒዮ ኮሎኒያሊስት እያሉ በሚጠሩት ሰበብ ተሳስረዋል፡፡
mt0: Kitty pointed out that the growing trade ties between China and the US created a political alliance between the two countries because they both called each other neo-colonialists.

en: Rather than training African reporters to be like Xinhua reporters, the Chinese goal in stepping up training and PR activities is to present a different picture of Chinese activities in Africa to counter the negative reporting eminating from the West.
amh: የአፍሪካ ሪፖረተሮች እንደ ዢኖዋ ሪፖርተሮች እንዲሆኑ በማሰልጠን ፈንታ፣ የቻይናውያን ዓላማ በምዕራባውያን ስለቻይና በአፍሪካ ኢንቨስትመንት የሚወራውን አሉታዊ ዜና የሚያስተባብል ስልጠና እና ማሕበራዊ ግንኙነት ላይ ማተኮር ይዘዋል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate, just say you don't know. Instead of training African reporters like Xinhua reporters, China's aim is to promote a teaching and social cooperation that suppresses negative reports about China's investments in Africa by Westerners.

en: The establishment of modern China-Africa relations dates back to the late 1950s when China signed the first official bilateral trade agreement with Algeria, Egypt, Guinea, Somalia, Morocco and Sudan.
amh: በ1950ዎቹ፣ ቻይና ከአልጄሪያ፣ ግብጽ፣ ጊኒ፣ ሶማሊያ፣ ሞሮኮ እና ሱዳን ጋር የጋራ ስምምነት ስትፈርም ነው፡፡
mt0: In the 1950s, China signed a partnership agreement with Algeria, Ethiopia, Guinea, Somalia, Morocco and Sudan.

en: However, ancient China-Africa relations date back as far as 202 BC and AD 220.
amh: በርግጥ፣ ጥንታዊው የቻይና-አፍሪካ ግንኙነት ከክ.
mt0: However, the ancient Chinese-African friendship dates back to the C.

en: Lebanon now boasts a Virtual Museum of Censorship, an online database of censorship cases in Lebanon since the 1940s.
amh: አ ጀምሮ በሊባኖስ የተደረጉ የሳንሱር እርምጃዎችን በመስመር ላይ የሚያስቀምጥ የመረጃ ቋት የመካነ ድር ዐውድ ርዕይ ለሳንሱር በመክፈት ተኩራርታለች፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: The website was launched by Lebanese organization MARCH to draw attention to information kept away from people.
amh: ይህ መካነ ድር ይፋ የተደረገው ማርች በተሰኘ የሊባኖስ ድርጅት ሲሆን ከህዝብ ርቀው ወደተቀመጡ መረጃዎች ትኩረትን ለመሳብ ነው፡፡
mt0: This website was published by the Libyan organization March to attract attention to information kept hidden from the public.

en: On September 2, 2012, the day the Museum of Censorship was launched, MARCH said:
amh: አ ይህ የመካነ ድር ዐውደ ርዕይ ለሳንሱር ይፋ ሲሆን ማርች እንዲህ ብሏል፡፡
mt0: This exhibition was opened to the public by Mary.

en: WELCOME TO THE VIRTUAL MUSEUM OF CENSORSHIP IN LEBANON !
amh: እንኳን ወደ ሊባኖስ የመካነ ድር ዐውደ ርዕይ ለሳንሱር በደህና መጣችኹ!
mt0: You're welcome to the Lebanon Textile Show for a souvenir!

en: Ever wondered WHAT was censored in Lebanon, WHEN, and particularly WHY?
amh: በሊባኖስ ምን ሳንሱር ሲደረግ እንደነበር ፣መቼ?
mt0: When did the sanctions be taken in Lebanon?

en: You have come to the right place.
amh: የሚለውን በማወቅ ፍጹም ለመገረም ወደ ትክክለኛው ስፍራ ነው የመጣችኹት፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know. If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Here, you will be able to look up material that was censored since the 1940's !
amh: እዚህ ከ1940 ጀምሮ ምን አይነት ነገሮች ሳንሱር ሲደረጉ እንደነበሩ መመልከት ትችላላችኹ፡፡
mt0: You can see what kinds of things were censored from 1940.

en: Heard of something that is being censored, is under the threat of being censored or has been censored in the past that we have missed/failed to spot?
amh: ከዚህ በፊት ሳንሱር የመደረግ አደጋ ላይ የነበሩ ወይም ከዚህ በፊት ሳንሱር ተደርገው የነበሩ እኛ ግን ለመለጠፍ ያላገኘቸው/የሳትናቸው ሳንሱር ስለተደረጉ አንዳንዶች ነገሮች ሰምታችኃል?
mt0: You heard of some things that were censored before or censored before, but we didn't find them to post.

en: Feel free to report it in order to complete the database.
amh: ለኛ ለመጠቆም ነጻ ሁኑ ፤ ምክንያቱም የመረጃመረቡን ምሉዕ ያደርጋልና፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Netizens can report censored movies, music, theater pieces, books, print and audiovisual content from 1940s to date on the website.
amh: የበየነ መረብ ተጠቃሚዎች የሚያውቋቸው 1940 ጀምሮ ሳንሱር የተደረጉ ህትመቶችና የምስልወድምጽ ይዘት ያላቸው ፊልሞች ፣ ሙዚቃዎች ፣ ቲያትሮች ፣ መጽሐፍት ካሉ ለመካነ ድሩ መጠቆም ይችላሉ፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate, just say you don't know. Internet users can suggest a library for a collection of 1940s censored films, music, plays, and books.

en: They are required to give the name of the censored work, the censorship date, entity and reason.
amh: ከእነርሱ የሚጠበቀው የታገደውን ስራ ስም ፣ የታገደበትን ቀን ፣ምክንያት እና የመኖሩን ምስክር መጥቀስ ነው፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: For instance, Charlie Chaplin's Great Dictator was banned in 1940 for its anti-Nazi views.
amh: ለምሳሌ በ1940 የቻርሊ ቻፒሊን ግሬት ዲክታተር ጸረ ናዚ እይታ ስላለው ታግዷል፡፡
mt0: For example, Charles Chaplin was banned in 1940 for having a Nazi view.

en: While, in 1990 LBC International received threats from the National Audiovisual Media Council to suspend its transmission over the broadcast of an interview with David Levy, the Israeli foreign Minister at that time.
amh: በ1990 ደግሞ ኤልቢሲ ኢንተርናሽናል በጊዜው የእስራኤል የውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስቴር ከነበሩት ዴቪድ ሌቪ ጋር ያደረገውን ቃለመጠይቅ ስርጭት እንዲያቋርጥ ከብሔራዊ የምስልወድምጽ ሚዲያ ካውንስል ማስፈራሪያ ደርሶታል፡፡
mt0: In 1990, the National Broadcasting Committee threatened ABC International to stop broadcasting a interview with the former Israeli Foreign Minister David Lavie.

en: Who censors in Lebanon?
amh: በሊባኖስ ሳንሱር የሚያደርገው ማነው?
mt0: Who is the Palestinian Authority?

en: The Virtual Museum of Censorship lists four main Lebanese censorship entities:
amh: የሳንሱር ዐውደ ርዕይ መካነ ድር በሊባኖስ አራት ዋና የእግድ ፈጻሚዎችን ይዘረዝራል፡፡
mt0: The Palestinian Cultural Center in Lebanon describes four main suspects.

en: General Security: Licensing, Monitoring, Censoring creative works
amh: ጠቅላላ ደህንነት፡
mt0: Overall security:

en: Provides licenses to publish for periodical publications
amh: ለፈጠራ ስራዎች ፍቃድ መስጠት፣ መቆጣጠር ፣ ሳንሱር ማድረግ
mt0: If you cannot translate simply say you don't know.

en: May suspend a TV channel for a maximum period of 3 days
amh: የመረጃ ሚኒስቴር : የውጭ የህመትቶች ውጤቶች ወደ ሀገር ውስጥ እንዳይገቡ ማዕቀብ መጣል ፣ቅጅውን በቁጥጥር ስር ማዋል ፣ በየጊዜው ለሚታተሙ የህትመት ውጤቶች እንዲታተሙ ፍቃድ መስጠት ምን አልባትም የቴሌቪዥን ስርጭቶችን እስከ ሶስት ቀናት ሊያዘገይ ይችላል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate, just say you don't know.

en: Can censor cinematic works from the preliminary stage of the censorship process, along with the General Security
amh: የሲኒማ ስራዎችን በቅደመ መድረክ የሳንሱር ሁደት ውስጥ በማሳለፍ ከጠቅላላ ደህንነት ጋር በመተባበር ሊያግድ ይችላል፡፡

en: The special administrative committee: In the case that General Security finds what it considers enough cause to prevent part or all of the film from being screened, a decision shall be made by the committee according to a majority vote of its member to allow the film to be screened as it is, to edit certain parts of the film or to ban the film from being screened altogether.
amh: ልዩ አስተዳደራዊ ኮሚቴ፡ ጠቅላላ ደህንነት የአንድን ፊልም በከፊል ወይም ሙሉውን ከመታየት ለማገድ በቂ ምክንያት ካገኘ ፊልሙ እንዳለ እንዲታይ ፣ የተወሰነው ክፍል አርትኦት እንዲሰራለት ወይንም ከናካቴው እንዲታገድ ውሳኔውን የሚያስተላልፈው የኮሚቴው አባላት በሚሰጡት አብላጫ ድምጽ ነው፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know. The Special Management Committee: General Safety when a film is blocked in part or entirely , a decision is made by the majority of the committee members.

en: The final decision shall officially be issued by the Ministry of Interior, alone.

mt0: The final decision is published at the end of the government. If you cannot translate the final decision simply say you don't know.

en: In Lebanon, censorship practices are either politically, religiously or morally motivated.
amh: በሊባኖስ የሳንሱር ልምዶች ፖለቲካዊ ፣ ሀይማኖታዊ ወይም የሞራላዊ መግፍኤዎች ውጤት ናቸው፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate the separation practices in Lebanon simply say you don't know.

en: The Virtual Museum of Censorship explains:
amh: ፖለቲካዊ ምክንያቶች፡
mt0: Political reasons:

en: Political reasons: regarding foreign relations with friendly countries, the censor pays considerable attention to the political sensitivities of Arab regimes and endeavors to safeguard diplomatic relations with these countries as well as banning attacks on the Palestinian cause and Arabs in general.
amh: ከወዳጅ ሀገራት ጋር የሚደረግ የውጭ ግንኙነትን በተመለከተ የሳንሱር ሂደቱ ለአረብ ሀገራት የአገዛዝ ስርዓቶች ፖለቲካዊ ትኩሳቶች ላቅ ያለ ትኩረትን ይሰጣል፤ ከእነዚህ ሀገራት ጋር ያለን ዲፕሎማሲያዊ ግንኙነቶች ለመጠበቅ ጥረት ያደርጋል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: Films on the civil war have been routinely censored since the nineties on the basis that referring to the conflict threatens civil peace”.
amh: ከዘጠናዎቹ ጀምሮ የሲቪል ሰላም በማስፈራራት” እንደመሰረት በመጥቀስ በእርስ በርስ ጦርነትን የሚያሳዩ ፊልሞችበተደጋጋሚ ታግደዋል፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know From the 1990s, violence-inducing films have been banned often because they are based on the principle of "threatening civil rights."

en: Israel: regarding relations with enemy states, censorship is firstly based on a national law that calls for the boycott of all Israeli products.
amh: ከጠላት ሀገር ጋር ያለ ግንኙነትን በተመለከተ መጀመሪያ ሳንሱር መሰረት ያደረገው የእስራኤል ምርቶችን በሙሉ አለመጠቀምን የሚጠራውን ብሔራዊ ህግ ነው፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Secondly, there is censorship of all forms of publicity or compassion for Israel : this boycott was initially observed by the entire Arab League.
amh: በመቀጠል ለእስራኤል ሁሉም አይነት ቅርጽ ያላቸው ማስተዋወቆች ወይም ርህራሄ ያላቸው ነገሮች ለእግድ ተዳርገዋል፡፡ ይህ እስራኤል ላይ የተጣለ እግድ በመነሻ በመላው የአረብ ሊግ ሀገራት ነበር፡፡
mt0: Next, all advertising or hospitality objects for Israel were prohibited. This ban was first imposed on all the Arab League countries.

en: Today, only Lebanon and Syria adhere to it stringently(...)

mt0: Today only Lebanon and Syria are trying to accomplish it. If you can't translate it simply say you don't know.

en: Religion: General Security will send creative works it thinks might upset religious sensitivities to their respective governing bodies (usually the Catholic Information Center or the Dar-al-Fatwa, which is Lebanon’s highest Sunni Muslim authority).
amh: ጠቅላይ ደህንነት የፈጠራ ውጤቶች ሀይማኖታዊ ቁጣዎችን የሚቀሰቅሱ ናቸው ብሎ ካሰበ ወደሚመለከታቸው አካላት (አብዛኛውን ጊዜ ለካቶሊክ የመረጃ ማዕከል ወይም በሊባኖስ ትልቁ የሱኒ ሙስሊም ባለስልጣን ለሆነው ለዳር አል ፈጣዋ ) ይልካቸዋል፡፡
mt0: If the NSA thinks that creations are religiously motivated, it sends them to authorities (usually to the Catholic Information Center or the largest Muslim official in Lebanon, Dar al-Fata'a)

en: Scenes or topics that question the ability of religion to counter evil and offensive scenes are removed.
amh: ገቢሮች ወይም ርዕሶች የሀይማኖትን አቅም ምላሽ የመጠየቅ ለመጻረር አቅም ካለውና የሚያስቀይም ከሆነ ገቢሮቹ ይወገዳሉ፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know. If arguments or topics cannot be translated simply say you don't know.

en: Obscene and Immoral content: regarding censorship material which offends public morals, contains scenes of nudity, sex and foul language are strictly censored and the censor generally determines the extent to which the film or work does not offend public morals.
amh: የህብረተሰቡን ሞራል የሚነካ ውጤትን በተመለከተ ሳንሱር የሚደረገው ራቁት ገቢር ፣ ወሲብና ጋጣወጥ ቋንቋን ያካተተ ከሆነ የግድ ሳንሱር ይደረጋሉ የሳንሱር ምርመራው የሚጠበቅበት ፊልምም ሆነ ሌላ ስራ የህብረተሰቡን ሞራል የማይነካ መሆኑን ማረጋገጥ ነው፡፡
mt0: If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know If the screening is compulsory for a film or other work that contains explicit sexual acts or erotic language , it must be screened. The screening is compulsory for a film or other work that does not offend the public.

en: Also, works that promote homosexuality are prohibited but violent scenes or scenes depicting drug use are allowed.

amh: @abbasbusafwan፤ ሳውዲ አረቢያ የዴሞክራሲ ምርጥ ምሳሌ ትመስለኛለች፤ ሹራ፣ ሰብዓዊ መብት፣ ነጻ ፕሬስ፣ በሀይማኖት እና ፓለቲካ መካከል ሚዛናውነት
mt0: @abbasbusafwan; Saudi Arabia seems to be the best example of democracy; separation of church and state, free press, equality between religion and politics.

en: Abu Yousif agrees that politics and religion don't mix:
amh: አቡ ዮሲፍ በሃይማኖት እና ፖለቲካ አለመቀላቀል ይስማማል፤
mt0: Abu Yusuf agrees to avoid political and religious interference.

en: @xronos2: I agree. We shouldn't mix religion with politics for they don't agree and then we would become a repressive regime like Iran
amh: @xronos2፤ እስማማለው ሃይማኖት እና ፖለቲካን መቀላቀል የለብንም እነርሱ ግን አይስማሙም ከዚያም ልክ እንደኢራን ጨቋኝ ስርዓት ይኖረናል፡፡
mt0: @xronos2; I agree that we should not join faith and politics but they don't, so we will have a fascist regime like Iran.

en: And Abu Karim says we should improve what we already have instead of importing a Western-style democracy:
amh: አቡ ካሪም የምዕራባውያን የዴሞክራሲ ዘዬ ከውጭ ከምናመጣ ያለንን ማሻሻል ይገባናል ይላል፤
mt0: Abu Kariya says that we should improve our democracy style from abroad, if we cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: @AbuKarim1: Our problem is that we want to implement Western theories on our societies instead of searching in what we have and modernising it
amh: @AbuKarim1፤ ችግራችን ያለንን ከማሠስ እና እርሱን ከማዘመን ይልቅ በእኛ ማኀበረሰብ ላይ የምዕራባውያንን ንድፈ ዐሳብ ለመተግበር እንፈልጋለን፡፡
mt0: @AbuKarim1; We want to apply the European philosophy to our society rather than to fix our problems and modify them.

en: Lightening the skin is a common practice in Africa where the sale of skin lightening products is legal in many countries.
amh: በብዙ የአፍሪካ ሀገሮች ቆዳን ማቅላት የተለመደ እና በህግም የተፈቀደ ተግባር ነው፡፡
mt0: In many African countries, cutting a sheep is common and legal.

en: However, the use of these creams is not safe: stretch marks, pimples, hair, hypertension and diabetes are all risks user take.
amh: በሴኔጋል ቆዳን የሚያቀላው እና ‹‹ኬስ ፔች›› የተባለው ምርት የድህረ ገፅ እሰጥ አገባ ቀስቅሷል፡፡

en: In Senegal, a whitening product named Khess Petch is creating controversy on the web.
amh: ኬን ፋቲም ዲዎፕ ነጭ ቆዳ በ15 ቀናት በማለት ሲገልፅ፡
mt0: When asked if he knew the truth, Ken explained that he had a black hair in 15 days.

en: Kiné Fatim Diop explains in 'A whiter skin in 15 days':
amh: ሙሉ ለሙሉ ነጭ ቆዳ ማለት አንድ የምእራብ አፍሪካ ሰው ኬስ ፔችን የሚተረጉምበት አግባብ ነው፡፡

en: Completely white, is how one translates the Wolof expression Khess Petch, the name of a new cream supposedly with skin whitening qualities.
amh: እርሱም ቆዳን ነጭ እንደሚያደርግ ተነገረለት የክሬም አይነት ነው፡፡
mt0: He also learned that it was a kind of clay.

en: Amadou Bakhaw DIAW on the site Ndarinfo, writes in 'The Khess Petch campaign, an insult to our identity':
amh: አማዱ ባካሃው DIAW Ndarinfo በተባለ ድረ ገፅ ላይ የኬስ ፔች ዘመቻ ለማንነታችን ሰድብ ባለው ፅሁፉ፡
mt0: If you can't translate, just say you don't know.

en: Twenty days ago, a new product called Khess Petch appeared in the Dakar greater area, on more than 100 billboards of 12 square meters each.
amh: ከ20 ቀናት በፊት ‹‹ኬስ ፔች›› የተባለ አዲስ ምርት በዳካር ዋነኛ ቦታዎች ላይ ከ100 በላይ በሆኑና እያንዳንዳቸው 12 ስኩዌር ሜትር መጠን ባላቸው የማስታወቂያ ቦታዎች ላይ ተሰቅሏል፡፡
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: With her blog post, 'A very clear skin at any cost: Understanding the phenomena in Africa', Carole Ouédraogo on the website NextAfrique explains that this phenomenon is common in many African countries:
amh: ብሏል፡፡ ካሮል ኦድራጎ በበኩሏ NextAfrique በተባለው ድረ ገጽ ላይ ንፁህ ቆዳ በማንኛውም ዋጋ፡ በአፍሪካ ያለውን ክስተት መረዳት ባለችው ጦማሯ ድርጊቱ በብዙ የአፍሪካ ሀገሮች ተለመደ ተግባር እንደሆነ ስትገልፅ፡
mt0: Caroline O'Drago wrote on NextAfrique's website that clean skin at any price: "I understand the situation in Africa," she wrote. "This is a common practice in many African countries."

en: The researchers estimate that roughly 25 % of women in Bamako, Mali use the skin lightening products... in South Africa 35% ... in Senegal 52% ...
amh: ምርምሮች በግርድፉ ሲያስቀምጡ በማሊ፣ ባማኮ ከሚኖሩት ሴቶች ውስጥ 25 በመቶው ቆዳን የሚያቀሉ ምርቶችን ይጠቀማሉ… በደቡብ አፍሪካ ደግሞ 35 በመቶ… በሴኔጋል 52 በመቶዎቹ ሴቶች፡፡
mt0: Researchers reported that 25 percent of Malian women use a combination of cosmetics... 35 percent in South Africa... 52 percent in Senegal.

en: And she adds:
amh: አስከትላም፡

en: Women in Senegal associate light skin with beauty, elegance and high social status.
amh: ሴኔጋላዊያን ሴቶች ቀላ ያለ ቆዳን እንደ ቁንጅና፣ ውበት እና በህብረተሰቡ ውስጥ ከፍተኛ ግምት እንደማግኛ አድርገው ያስቀምጡታል፡፡
mt0: Female Senegalese women consider curly hair to be a sign of youth, beauty and a significant attraction in the community.

en: On the blog A Toubab in Dakar, a blog post entitled 'The Xessalisation a.k.a the stupid quest for whiteness' tries to answer the question Why whiten your skin?:
amh: ከዳካር የሚፃፈው ኤ ቱባብ (ቱባብ ማለት በምዕራብ አፍሪካ ዘየ የምዕራቡ አለም ሰው ማለት ነው) የተባለው ጦማር The Xessalisation ማለትም ነጭ የመሆን ፍላጎት ድድብና ባለው ፅሁፉ ለምን ቆዳዎን ነጭ ያደርጉታል?
mt0: Why do you dye your skin?

en: Some believe that Senegalese man love clear skin, so somewomen whiten their skin to please them.
amh: ሌሎች ደግሞ ይህ ‹‹የበታችነት ስሜት መገለጫ›› ነው ይላሉ….

en: Other talk of aninferiority complex …
amh: ቆዳን ማንጣት፡

en: Blogger Fatou on Blackbeautybag goes further in his post 'Skin Whitening: Practices, Challenges and Accoutability':
amh: በተግባር፣ ተግዳሮቱ እና ተጠያቂነት ባለው ጦማር፤ ጦማሪ ፋቱ በብላክቢዩቲባግ ጦማር ላይ ፡
mt0: In a practical, practical and responsible blog, blogger Fatu writes on the blog Lakeview.

en: These issues are related to sequels from slavery and colonialism.
amh: ይህ ጉዳይ ከባርነት እና ቅኛ አገዛዝ ጋር ግንኙነት ያለው ነው፡፡

en: Rapidly, a citizen awareness project exposing the risks of the cream grew on social networks.
